Jour\u00adnal of Travel Research (51), 768-778.; http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779; doi:10.3989\/estgeogr.202056.056","identifier":"http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.3989\/estgeogr.202056.056","title":"The \u201cnetwork\u201d protocol applied to the study of tourist destinations: the case of Gijon (Spain) ; El protocolo \u201cnetwork\u201d aplicado al estudio de los destinos tur\u00edsticos: el caso de Gij\u00f3n (Espa\u00f1a)","paper_abstract":"The definition of the concept of destination is a very complicated matter, given the need for consensus between different types of academics and professionals. However, it is essential to establish an adequate framework of knowledge for planning and managing tourism. Most of the new proposals revolve around the Network perspective, with intra and interrelation\u00adships between agents, attractions and tourist services, and even destinations. The \u201csecond generation\u201d experience factor, support\u00aded by the phenomenon of co-creation, is currently considered the leitmotif for tourists. According to this concept, it is the tourists who, with the choices of resources and services, and with their movements in the territories, really define a destination as such, and in its different facets. This work uses the well-known SmartMax game to offer an empirical protocol of knowledge, quantitative and qualitative, of a tourist destination. Relying on data on the mobility of tourists, and using multivariable analysis techniques, it is possible to identify the different profiles of geographic space as a tourist destination, as well as the relative weight of each one: single destination, headquarters, a destination of circuit and hiking destination. In this way, a useful methodology is built for the empirical knowledge of tourist destinations, in general, and even for its application in other areas of geographic marketing, in particular. ; La definici\u00f3n del concepto de destino es un asunto muy complejo, dada la necesidad de consenso entre distintos tipos de acad\u00e9micos y de profesionales, pero muy necesaria para poder establecer un marco adecuado de conocimiento orientado a la planificaci\u00f3n y a la gesti\u00f3n del turismo. La mayor\u00eda de las nuevas propuestas giran en torno a la perspectiva de Red (Network), con intra e interrelaciones entre agentes, atracciones y servicios tur\u00edsticos, e incluso destinos. El factor experiencia de \u201csegunda generaci\u00f3n\u201d, apoyado en el fen\u00f3meno de la co-creaci\u00f3n, es actualmente considerado el leit motiv para el turista. De acuerdo a tal concepto son los turistas quienes, con las elecciones de recursos y servicios, y con sus movimientos en los territorios, definen realmente un destino como tal, y en sus diferentes facetas. Este trabajo recurre al uso del conocido juego del SmartMax para ofrecer un protocolo emp\u00edrico de conocimiento, cuantitativo y cualitativo, de un destino tur\u00edstico. Apoy\u00e1ndose en datos sobre la movilidad de los turistas, y mediante t\u00e9cnicas de an\u00e1lisis multivariable, se consigue identificar los diferentes perfiles de un espacio geogr\u00e1fico como destino tur\u00edstico, as\u00ed como el peso relativo de cada uno de ellos: destino \u00fanico, sede central, destino de circuito y destino de excursionismo. De esta forma se construye una metodolog\u00eda \u00fatil para el conocimiento emp\u00edrico de los destinos tur\u00eds\u00adticos, de forma general, e incluso para su aplicaci\u00f3n en otros \u00e1mbitos del marketing geogr\u00e1fico, en particular.","published_in":"Estudios Geogr\u00e1ficos; Vol 81, No 288 (2020); e041 ; 1988-8546 ; 0014-1496 ; 10.3989\/egeogr.2020.i288","year":"2020-06-30","subject_orig":"Tourism destinations; Co-creation; Touristic Flows; Tourist Statistics; Tourism maps; Tourism Products; Destinos tur\u00edsticos; Co-creaci\u00f3n; Flujos tur\u00edsticos; Estad\u00edsticas tur\u00edsticas; Mapas tur\u00edsticos; Productos tur\u00edsticos","subject":"Tourism destinations; Co-creation; Touristic Flows; Tourist Statistics; Tourism maps; Tourism Products; Destinos tur\u00edsticos; Co-creaci\u00f3n; Flujos tur\u00edsticos; Estad\u00edsticas tur\u00edsticas; Mapas tur\u00edsticos; Productos tur\u00edsticos","authors":"de la Ballina Ballina, Francisco Javier","link":"http:\/\/estudiosgeograficos.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/estudiosgeograficos\/article\/view\/779","oa_state":"1","url":"9d5d103e2d3fa4c4f62ec3237f4716899cea6aac1e7ba2cecbe84c65c33fa3eb","relevance":65},{"id":"ba9e8236d2b658fad00cf98f36695a83b52c92ca2fa2f7cec7ee0464174e4aab","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/884921; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/ijere\/issue\/50209\/659214; doi:10.24331\/ijere.659214","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/ijere\/issue\/50209\/659214; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.24331\/ijere.659214","title":"Educational Innovation affects Leadership and Interpersonal Relations in an Experimental School in Northern Greece","paper_abstract":"Even though the educational system in Greece is exceedingly centralized, thepioneering institution of \u201cExperimental Schools\u201d sheds a ray of light. Theinnovative and researching acts are systematically conducted in experimentalschools with the aim to acquire, communicate and disperse knowledge. Basedon previous research findings regarding experimental units\u2019 hypotheses wasdeveloped towards the argument that innovation is directly correlated with (i)leadership (ii) communication, (iii) interpersonal relationships among teachingstaff, contributing to a more effective transfer of knowledge and educationaleffectiveness. Within this framework, the aim of the present study is toinvestigate the association between the innovation and the leadership style aswell as the interpersonal staff relations of the educational unit, the motivation,the work satisfaction and the communication in an experimental school unit.The primary quantitative study was conducted, using a structuredquestionnaire, in an experimental primary school in Northern Greece. Dataacquired were processed using SPSS v20 and AMOS v17 statistical software. Inthe first stage the process of descriptive statistics and crosstabs analysis wasimplemented, and in following stages, factor analysis and Structural EquationModeling was conducted. Results indicated that innovation is strongly interassociatedwith motivation. Additionally, innovation is positively associatedwith job satisfaction, interpersonal relations, leadership and communicationinside and outside the educational unit. The way the leadership is imposed ischanging using innovation procedures and becomes more participativeinvolving the whole educational staff in the process. The research outcomesindicated that through innovation an educational unit obtains openness to thecommunity, resulting in interpersonal relations reinforcement and in transfer ofknowledge. All in all, innovation affects the relations and the way people workin an educational unit to the better and it may be alleged that innovationpositively alters the profile of the organization.","published_in":"Volume: 5, Issue: 1 61-69 ; 2458-9322 ; International Journal of Educational Research Review","year":"2020-01-01T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Innovation,motivation,job satisfaction","subject":"Innovation,motivation,job satisfaction","authors":"AVDIMIOTIS, Spyros; PAPADOPOULOU, Eleni","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/ijere\/issue\/50209\/659214","oa_state":"2","url":"ba9e8236d2b658fad00cf98f36695a83b52c92ca2fa2f7cec7ee0464174e4aab","relevance":64},{"id":"105995ed9a81513350c36d2cef0200493445ce651bbb4d21d198177ba70146be","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1083190; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/52965\/666043; doi:10.26466\/opus.666043","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/52965\/666043; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.26466\/opus.666043","title":"\u00d6\u011fretmenlerin \u00d6z Liderlik Alg\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n \u0130\u015f Doyumlar\u0131 \u00dczerine Etkisi ; The Effect of Teachers\u2019 Self Leadership Perceptions on Job Satisfaction","paper_abstract":"Bu ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n amac\u0131, Anadolu liselerinde g\u00f6rev yapan \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin \u00f6z liderlik alg\u0131lar\u0131 ile i\u015f doyumlar\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkinin belirlenmesidir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma, betimsel ara\u015ft\u0131rma y\u00f6ntemlerinden tarama modelindedir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma s\u00fcrecinde Gaziantep ilindeki Anadolu liselerinde g\u00f6rev yapan 477 \u00f6\u011fretmenden olu\u015fan kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131 gruba \u201c\u00d6z Liderlik \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fi\u201d, \u201c\u0130\u015f Doyum \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fi\u201d ve ki\u015fisel bilgi formundan olu\u015fan veri toplama ara\u00e7lar\u0131 uygulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmada, de\u011fi\u015fkenler aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkiyi belirlemek amac\u0131yla korelasyon analizi, ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z de\u011fi\u015fkenin ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fken \u00fczerindeki etkisini incelemek i\u00e7in ise \u00e7oklu regresyon analizleri yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca regresyon analizi ile ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan yap\u0131n\u0131n do\u011frulanmas\u0131 i\u00e7in yol analizi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma bulgular\u0131 incelendi\u011finde, \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin \u00f6z liderlik alg\u0131lar\u0131 ile i\u015f doyumlar\u0131 aras\u0131nda orta d\u00fczeyde pozitif ve anlaml\u0131 bir ili\u015fki oldu\u011fu sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Regresyon analizi sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na g\u00f6re ise \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin \u00f6z liderlik alg\u0131s\u0131, i\u015f doyum d\u00fczeyinin anlaml\u0131 bir yorday\u0131c\u0131d\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca yap\u0131lan yol analizinde, kurgulanan modelin uyum iyili\u011fi indeks de\u011ferlerinin de kabul edilebilir de\u011ferler i\u00e7erisinde yer ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na ba\u011fl\u0131 olarak, \u00f6z liderlik alg\u0131s\u0131 artt\u0131k\u00e7a bireylerin i\u015f doyum d\u00fczeylerinin de artt\u0131\u011f\u0131 ve \u00f6z liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131n\u0131 artt\u0131r\u0131c\u0131 e\u011fitimlerin \u00f6\u011fretmenlere verilmesinin bireysel ve \u00f6rg\u00fctsel geli\u015fime katk\u0131 sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131 s\u00f6ylenebilir. ; The aim of this study was to determine the relationship between self-leadership perceptions and job satisfaction of teachers working at Anatolian high schools. The study was based on survey model among descriptive research methods. During the data collection process, the working group including 477 teachers working at Anatolian high schools in Gaziantep were administered \u201cSelf-Leadership Scale\u201d, \u201cJob Satisfaction Scale\u201d and self-description form. Correlation analysis was used to determine the relationship between the variables while multiple regression analyzes were performed to examine the effect of independent variable on the dependent one. In addition, path analysis was conducted to confirm the model that was created through regression analysis. According to the findings of the study, it was concluded that there was a moderate, positive and significant relationship between self-leadership perceptions and job satisfaction of teachers. The results of regression analysis yielded that teachers' self-leadership perception was a significant predictor of their level of job satisfaction. Moreover, it was confirmed that the goodness of fit indices of the obtained model were within acceptable limits based on the path analysis. As a result of research, it can be claimed that job satisfaction levels of individuals increase together with the rise in self-leadership perceptions and that trainings to enhance teachers\u2019 self-leadership behaviors will contribute to individual and organizational development.","published_in":"Volume: 15, Issue: 25 3098-3119 ; 2528-9527 ; 2528-9535 ; OPUS Uluslararas\u0131 Toplum Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 Dergisi","year":"2020-05-31T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"\u00d6z liderlik,i\u015f doyumu,\u00f6\u011fretmen; self leadership,job satisfaction,teacher","subject":"\u00d6z liderlik,i\u015f doyumu,\u00f6\u011fretmen; self leadership,job satisfaction,teacher","authors":"\u00d6ZDEM\u0130R, G\u00f6k\u00e7e","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/52965\/666043","oa_state":"2","url":"105995ed9a81513350c36d2cef0200493445ce651bbb4d21d198177ba70146be","relevance":63},{"id":"3d444b8795feddc972a62d2f87e3e004f7b5a2c905c32af77ab0116013cdca29","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1083200; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/52965\/667320; doi:10.26466\/opus.667320","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/52965\/667320; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.26466\/opus.667320","title":"Toxic Leadership Behaviours of School Administrators As Predictor Of Teachers' School Climate Perceptions ; \u00d6\u011fretmenlerin Okul \u0130klimi Alg\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n Yorday\u0131c\u0131s\u0131 Olarak Okul Y\u00f6neticilerinin Toksik Liderlik Davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131","paper_abstract":"The aim of this study is to determine the effect of toxic leadership behaviors of school administrators\u2019 on teachers' perception of school climate by examining the relationship between school leadership and toxic leadership behaviours of school administrators according to teachers' perceptions. The data obtained from 245 teachers were used in the study conducted with relational survey model. According to the findings of the study, teachers\u2019 perceptions of school climate were good and school administrators' toxic leadership behaviors were below mean; in addition, negative, significant and medium relationships were found between school climate and its sub-dimensions and toxic leadership and its sub-dimensions. According to study results, 44% of the school climate was explained by the sub-dimensions of toxic leadership. When the results of the estimation of school climate according to the sub-dimensions of toxic leadership were examined, it was found that the negative mood was a significant predictor of school climate. It was concluded that the negative mental state predicts democratism and the dedication to school which is the sub-dimension of the school climate, while negative mental state and self-interestness predicts leadership and interaction. ; Bu ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n amac\u0131 \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin alg\u0131lar\u0131na g\u00f6re okul y\u00f6neticilerinin toksik liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 ile okul iklimi aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkiyi inceleyerek; \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin okul iklimi alg\u0131lar\u0131nda okul y\u00f6neticilerinin toksik liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n etkisini belirlemektir. \u0130li\u015fkisel tarama modeli ile y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma kapsam\u0131nda 245 \u00f6\u011fretmen \u00fczerinden elde edilen veriler kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma bulgular\u0131na g\u00f6re \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin okul iklimi alg\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n iyi d\u00fczeyde oldu\u011fu, okul y\u00f6neticilerinin toksik liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n ise ortalaman\u0131n alt\u0131nda oldu\u011fu; ayr\u0131ca okul iklimi ve alt boyutlar\u0131 ile toksik liderlik ve alt boyutlar\u0131 aras\u0131nda genelde negatif y\u00f6nde, anlaml\u0131 ve orta d\u00fczeyde ili\u015fkiler oldu\u011fu tespit edilmi\u015ftir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n bir di\u011fer sonucuna g\u00f6re okul ikliminin \u2019\u00fcn\u00fcn toksik liderli\u011fin alt boyutlar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan a\u00e7\u0131kland\u0131\u011f\u0131 belirlenmi\u015ftir. Okul ikliminin toksik liderli\u011fin alt boyutlar\u0131na g\u00f6re yordanmas\u0131na ili\u015fkin sonu\u00e7lar incelendi\u011finde olumsuz ruhsal durumun okul iklimi \u00fczerinde anlaml\u0131 bir yorday\u0131c\u0131 oldu\u011fu tespit edilmi\u015ftir. Okul iklimin alt boyutu olan demokratiklik ve okula adanma \u00fczerinde olumsuz ruhsal durumun; liderlik ve etkile\u015fim \u00fczerinde ise olumsuz ruhsal durum ve \u00e7\u0131karc\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n anlaml\u0131 birer yorday\u0131c\u0131 oldu\u011fu sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.","published_in":"Volume: 15, Issue: 25 3360-3381 ; 2528-9527 ; 2528-9535 ; OPUS Uluslararas\u0131 Toplum Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 Dergisi","year":"2020-05-31T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Toxic Leadership,School Climate,Teacher,School Administrator; Toksik Liderlik,liderlik,okul iklimi,\u00f6\u011fretmen,okul y\u00f6neticisi","subject":"Toxic Leadership,School Climate,Teacher,School Administrator; Toksik Liderlik,liderlik,okul iklimi,\u00f6\u011fretmen,okul y\u00f6neticisi","authors":"TEPE, Nagihan; YILMAZ, G\u00fcl\u015fen","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/52965\/667320","oa_state":"2","url":"3d444b8795feddc972a62d2f87e3e004f7b5a2c905c32af77ab0116013cdca29","relevance":62},{"id":"428afa4f9380f0392b112e1ace3b3ff4b220a8bae6f0c3fe7777434391a158c3","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/969452; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/atauniiibd\/issue\/52474\/671720; doi:10.16951\/atauniiibd.671720","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/atauniiibd\/issue\/52474\/671720; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.16951\/atauniiibd.671720","title":"THE IMPACT OF ETH\u0130CAL LEADERSH\u0130P ON INTREPRENEURSH\u0130P: A RESEARCH \u0130N \u00c7ANAKKALE ; ET\u0130K L\u0130DERL\u0130\u011e\u0130N \u0130\u00c7 G\u0130R\u0130\u015e\u0130MC\u0130L\u0130\u011eE ETK\u0130S\u0130: \u00c7ANAKKALE\u2019DE B\u0130R ARA\u015eTIRMA","paper_abstract":"In today's world, leadership is of the utmost importance for businesses to sustain their lives and provide sustainable competitive advantage. The leader should be focused on the future, not now. It is stated that this prospective perspective will facilitate the future needs of the enterprise. Ethical leadership is one of the most important of leadership that is increasingly important and subject to various researches. Ethical leadership is not an easy leadership style. Because it is a style of leadership that requires sacrifice and full promise to subordinates. The determinants of entrepreneurship in organizations are both the personal factors arising from the employee and the leader behaviors within the organization. The leadership mentioned here is a leader's adoption of a management style that promotes ethical behavior and internal entrepreneurship. This study is particularly important in terms of providing clues as to whether or not the employees in the industrial sector in \u00c7anakkale have an entrepreneurial spirit and which or which factors are related to them. In addition, the questionnaire forms were distributed to the industrial enterprises of the province of \u00c7anakkale by the researcher between August-October 2019 in total 320 questionnaires and 240 completed questionnaires were collected. In this context, a high return of 75% was obtained from the participants. As a finding of the study, it was observed that \u00c7anakkale industrial enterprises had a positive perspective on ethical leadership and internal entrepreneurship. ; G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcz d\u00fcnyas\u0131nda i\u015fletmelerin hayatlar\u0131n\u0131 devam ettirebilmesi ve s\u00fcrd\u00fcr\u00fclebilir rekabet \u00fcst\u00fcnl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc sa\u011flayabilmesi i\u00e7in liderlik \u00e7ok b\u00fcy\u00fck bir \u00f6neme sahiptir. Liderin \u015fimdiye de\u011fil, gelece\u011fe odakl\u0131 olmas\u0131 gerekmektedir. Bu ileriye d\u00f6n\u00fck bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n da i\u015fletmenin gelecekteki ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 kolayla\u015ft\u0131raca\u011f\u0131 belirtilmi\u015ftir. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde \u00f6nemi giderek artan ve \u00e7e\u015fitli ara\u015ft\u0131rmalara konu olan liderli\u011fin en \u00f6nemlilerinden biri de etik liderliktir. \u00d6rg\u00fctlerdeki giri\u015fimcili\u011fin belirleyicileri, hem \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan\u0131n kendisinden kaynaklanan ki\u015fisel fakt\u00f6rler hem de \u00f6rg\u00fct i\u00e7erisindeki lider davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131d\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma \u00f6zellikle \u00c7anakkale ilinde sanayii sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde bulunan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n giri\u015fimcilik ruhuna sahip olup olmad\u0131klar\u0131 ve bununla ilgili fakt\u00f6rlerden hangisine ya da hangilerine kendilerini yak\u0131n bulduklar\u0131 konular\u0131na dair ipu\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011flanmas\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan \u00f6nemlidir. Bu ba\u011flamda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada nicel ara\u015ft\u0131rma y\u00f6ntemlerinin kullan\u0131lmas\u0131 uygun g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f ve veriler kolayda \u00f6rnekleme y\u00f6ntemi ile toplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma kapsam\u0131nda anket formlar\u0131 \u00c7anakkale ili sanayii i\u015fletmelerine ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan A\u011fustos-Ekim 2019 tarihleri aras\u0131nda toplam 320 anket da\u011f\u0131t\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, 240 tamamlanm\u0131\u015f anket toplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n sonu\u00e7lar\u0131na bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda etik liderlik ve i\u00e7 giri\u015fimcilik konular\u0131na \u00c7anakkale sanayi i\u015fletmeleri \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n olumlu bir bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131na sahip olduklar\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Bununla beraber \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar etik liderli\u011fin i\u00e7 giri\u015fimcilikleri pozitif olarak etkiledi\u011fini belirtmi\u015flerdir.","published_in":"Volume: 34, Issue: 1 257-272 ; 1300-4646 ; 2147-7582 ; Atat\u00fcrk \u00dcniversitesi \u0130ktisadi ve \u0130dari Bilimler Dergisi","year":"2020-01-25T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Ethical Leadership,Internal Entrepreneurship,Innovation; Etik Liderlik,\u0130\u00e7 Giri\u015fimcilik,Yenilikcilik","subject":"Ethical Leadership,Internal Entrepreneurship,Innovation; Etik Liderlik,\u0130\u00e7 Giri\u015fimcilik,Yenilikcilik","authors":"KASAP, Mesut","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/atauniiibd\/issue\/52474\/671720","oa_state":"2","url":"428afa4f9380f0392b112e1ace3b3ff4b220a8bae6f0c3fe7777434391a158c3","relevance":61},{"id":"b751694b7f89bf7325d55bfefe007df34a53b6c5cae23d3866174c2f3b3e9c13","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1167347; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/idealkent\/issue\/54963\/681057; doi:10.31198\/idealkent.681057","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/idealkent\/issue\/54963\/681057; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.31198\/idealkent.681057","title":"Aktif ve Pasif Yurtta\u015flardan Olu\u015fan Toplumlarda Planlama S\u00fcreci ve Planc\u0131n\u0131n Rol\u00fc ; Planning Process and the Role of the Planner in Communities of Active and Passive Citizens","paper_abstract":"Bu yaz\u0131n\u0131n amac\u0131 aktif ve pasif yurtta\u015flardan olu\u015fan farkl\u0131 toplum yap\u0131lar\u0131nda ne t\u00fcr planlama s\u00fcre\u00e7lerinin ortaya \u00e7\u0131kabilece\u011fi konusunda bir tart\u0131\u015fma yapmakt\u0131r. Aktif veya pasif yurtta\u015fl\u0131k, bu yurtta\u015flar\u0131n olu\u015fturdu\u011fu farkl\u0131 toplumsal yap\u0131, bu yap\u0131 i\u00e7erinde ortaya \u00e7\u0131kabilecek liderlik bi\u00e7imleri, temsili veya kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131 demokrasi ve nas\u0131l bir planlama sorusu bu yaz\u0131n\u0131n temel sorular\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Yurtta\u015fl\u0131k temelli ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan toplumsal yap\u0131 farkl\u0131l\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131n plan\u0131n me\u015fruiyetini, uygulanmas\u0131n\u0131, \u00f6rg\u00fctlenmesini ve planlama s\u00fcrecini nas\u0131l etkiledi\u011fine dair tart\u0131\u015fmalar, Orta Do\u011fu Teknik \u00dcniversitesi, \u015eehir ve B\u00f6lge Planlama Doktora Program\u0131nda Prof. Dr. \u0130lhan Tekeli taraf\u0131ndan y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclen derslerde yap\u0131lan teorik tart\u0131\u015fmalar ve de\u011ferlendirmeler \u00e7er\u00e7evesinde geli\u015fmi\u015ftir. Bu ba\u011flamda, yaz\u0131n\u0131n y\u00f6ntemi temel kavramlar\u0131n \u00e7er\u00e7evesinin \u00e7izilmesi ve farkl\u0131 \u00f6rnekler \u00fczerinden kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmal\u0131 de\u011ferlendirmeye dayanmaktad\u0131r. Bu de\u011ferlendirme sonucunda, sosyal, ekonomik ve k\u00fclt\u00fcrel y\u0131\u011f\u0131lma noktalar\u0131 olan kentlerde farkl\u0131 planlama ve uygulama s\u00fcre\u00e7lerinin kentli yurtta\u015fl\u0131kla ili\u015fkili olarak olu\u015ftu\u011fu g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Sonu\u00e7 olarak, ortaya koyulan farkl\u0131 yurtta\u015f davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131, toplumsal yap\u0131 ve liderlik gibi etmenler dikkate al\u0131narak planlaman\u0131n me\u015fruiyeti, uygulanmas\u0131, \u00f6rg\u00fctlenme ve nas\u0131l bir planlama s\u00fcrecinin ger\u00e7ekle\u015febilece\u011fine dair \u00f6neriler geli\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. ; The aim of article is to discuss what kind of planning processes could emerge in different community structures consisting of active and passive citizens. Active or passive citizenship, the different social structure created by these citizens, the leadership styles that emerging within this structure, representative or participatory democracy and what kind of planning approaches are the main questions of the article. Discussions on how the social structure differences that emerged based on citizenship affect the legitimacy, implementation, organiza-tion and planning process of the plan was developed within the framework of theoretical dis-cussions and evaluations in the courses (Middle East Technical University, City and Region-al Planning Doctorate Program) conducted by Prof. Dr. \u0130lhan Tekeli. In this context, the method of study is based on defining the basic concepts and comparative evaluation through different cases. As a result of these evaluations, it was observed that different planning and implementation processes occurred in cities with social, economic and cultural accumulation points in relation with urban citizenship. As a result, suggestions have been developed re-garding the legitimacy, implementation, organization and what kind of planning process can take place by considering the factors such as different citizen behaviours, social structure and leadership.","published_in":"Volume: 11, Issue: 29 350-372 ; 1307-9905 ; 2602-2133 ; \u0130DEALKENT","year":"2020-04-30T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Aktif yurtta\u015f; pasif yurtta\u015f,planlama s\u00fcreci,planc\u0131n\u0131n rol\u00fc; Active citizen,passive citizen,democracy,planning process","subject":"Aktif yurtta\u015f; pasif yurtta\u015f,planlama s\u00fcreci,planc\u0131n\u0131n rol\u00fc; Active citizen,passive citizen,democracy,planning process","authors":"BELGE, Z\u00fcleyha Sara","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/idealkent\/issue\/54963\/681057","oa_state":"2","url":"b751694b7f89bf7325d55bfefe007df34a53b6c5cae23d3866174c2f3b3e9c13","relevance":60},{"id":"108a764e64851122a5888d88ae9440d167e4218a0bad4b389558c16b597a638e","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1151881; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/arhuss\/issue\/54943\/689939","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/arhuss\/issue\/54943\/689939","title":"\u0130SLAM GELENE\u011e\u0130NE G\u00d6RE Y\u00d6NET\u0130C\u0130LER\u0130N VE L\u0130DERLER\u0130N TA\u015eIMASI GEREKEN \u00d6ZELL\u0130KLER ; THE LEADERSHIP TRAITS OF MANAGERS AND LEADERS ACCORDING TO THE ISLAMIC TRADITION","paper_abstract":"\u0130slam dininde y\u00f6neticilik\/liderlik, imamet ve hilafet kavramlar\u0131 \u00fczerinden a\u00e7\u0131klanmaktad\u0131r. Y\u00f6neticilerin ta\u015f\u0131mas\u0131 gereken liderlik \u00f6zellikleri yine imamet\/hilafet kavramlar\u0131 ba\u011flam\u0131nda hem Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim\u2019de h\u00fckmedilmekte hem de \u0130slam d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcrlerinin y\u00f6neticilere y\u00f6nelik yazd\u0131klar\u0131 ve g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde de ge\u00e7erlili\u011fini koruyan tavsiye niteli\u011findeki eserlerde vurgulanmaktad\u0131r. Bu ba\u011flamda bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131, Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim\u2019deki ayetleri, son Peygamber Hz. Muhammed\u2019in (s.a.v) hayat\u0131n\u0131 anlatan kaynaklar\u0131 ve \u0130slam d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcrlerinin eserlerini inceleyerek \u0130slam gelene\u011finde y\u00f6neticilerin sahip olmas\u0131 gereken \u00f6zellikleri ortaya \u00e7\u0131karman\u0131n beraberinde M\u00dcS\u0130AD \u00fcyesi i\u015f adamlar\u0131n\u0131n bu \u00f6zellikleri ta\u015f\u0131y\u0131p ta\u015f\u0131mad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ortaya koymakt\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n y\u00f6ntemi, \u00f6nce literat\u00fcr taramas\u0131 \u015feklinde ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015f olup Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim\u2019de yer alan ayetler, \u0130slami eserler ve \u0130slam d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcrleri taraf\u0131ndan \u0130slami y\u00f6neticilere y\u00f6nelik yaz\u0131lan eserler detayl\u0131 bir bi\u00e7imde incelenmi\u015ftir. Sonras\u0131nda, M\u00fcstakil Sanayici ve \u0130\u015f Adamlar\u0131 Derne\u011fi (M\u00dcS\u0130AD) Bursa \u015fubesi \u00fcyeleriyle m\u00fclakat yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olup elde edilen veriler nitel olarak analiz edilmi\u015ftir. Bu ba\u011flamda, yap\u0131lan m\u00fclakatlar\u0131n analiz edilmesiyle elde edilen bulgular, M\u00dcS\u0130AD \u00fcyesi i\u015f adamlar\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fcm bu \u00f6zellikleri ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir. ; Islam religion approaches leadership in the frame of hilafet (khilafah)\/imamet (imamate). The leadership traits that the managers should display, are both commanded in Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim in terms of hilafet\/imamet and suggested in the masterpieces of Islamic philosophers. The main purpose of this study is to reveal the required leadership traits of managers in the frame of Islamic tradition by scrutinizing the verses (ayahs) in Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim, the sources about the last Prophet Muhammed (s.a.v) and examining the masterpieces of Islamic philosophers. In addition, it is aimed to put forward the fact, if businessmen, who are members of Independent Industrialists and Businessmen Association (M\u00fcstakil Sanayici ve \u0130\u015f Adamlar\u0131 Derne\u011fi-M\u00dcS\u0130AD) carry these qualities or not. The method of the research is literature review and interview. In this sense, the hadiths in Koran, Islamic masterpieces and the masterpieces that are written for Islamic managers by Islamic philosophers are scrutinized. Upon that, an interview is conducted with the members of M\u00dcS\u0130AD Bursa branch and the data is analysed via qualitative analysis. According to the findings, members of M\u00dcS\u0130AD carry all these qualifications.","published_in":"Volume: 3, Issue: 1 72-96 ; 2636-7645 ; Academic Review of Humanities and Social Sciences","year":"2020-06-15T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"\u0130slam,Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim,Y\u00f6neticilik,Liderlik,M\u00dcS\u0130AD; Islam,Koran,Management,Leadership,MUS\u0130AD,Businessmen","subject":"\u0130slam,Kur\u2019an-\u0131 Kerim,Y\u00f6neticilik,Liderlik,M\u00dcS\u0130AD; Islam,Koran,Management,Leadership,MUS\u0130AD,Businessmen","authors":"R\u00dcZGAR, Nil\u00fcfer","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/arhuss\/issue\/54943\/689939","oa_state":"2","url":"108a764e64851122a5888d88ae9440d167e4218a0bad4b389558c16b597a638e","relevance":59},{"id":"a010248499d78e3339f653310e1fc7c08cf511b8010c2524b9cecaec2edd597d","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1154896; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jegys\/issue\/53184\/691713; doi:10.17478\/jegys.691713","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jegys\/issue\/53184\/691713; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.17478\/jegys.691713","title":"Characteristics and educational needs of gifted young scientists: a focus group study","paper_abstract":"The Gifted Young Scientists (GYS) is the students who have certain intellectual, creative, artistic, leadership, or academic abilities that are higher than the average ability of students in general, they need different educational services (special need). This study aims to analyze the potential of gifted young scientists in terms of critical thinking in the village area in Indonesia. The study was conducted using a multi-case multi-site case study design involving 4 managers, 5 teachers, and 5 students in the High School. Data collected through in depth and focus group interviews then analyzed qualitatively with thematically. The study found that there were four characteristics of gifted young scientists in the High School studied, namely; (i) very active and creative, (ii) easy and quick to receive information and materials, (iii) have a very high curiosity, (iv) love the high-level and challenging learning process. These findings indicate that the self-contained class students in high school meet the criteria of gifted young scientists. Thus, differentiated curriculum, high quality learning process with different teachers, materials, and approaches need to be designed seriously and continuously for the maximum student development process.","published_in":"Volume: 8, Issue: 2 947-954 ; 2149-360X ; Journal for the Education of Gifted Young Scientists","year":"2020-06-15T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Gifted Young Scientists,Management Studies,Significant Superior Ability,Islamic School","subject":"Gifted Young Scientists,Management Studies,Significant Superior Ability,Islamic School","authors":"SYAFR\u0130L, Syafrimen; YAUMAS, Nova; ISHAK, Noriah; YUSOF, Rorlinda; JAAFAR, Azhar; YUNUS, Melor; SUG\u0130HARTA, Iip","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jegys\/issue\/53184\/691713","oa_state":"2","url":"a010248499d78e3339f653310e1fc7c08cf511b8010c2524b9cecaec2edd597d","relevance":58},{"id":"a4cf88e044c5a30a4f9d92bfe9532d9687ecc2a829c6aa0000931c136f031a88","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1076843; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/selcuksbmyd\/issue\/53906\/692006; doi:10.29249\/selcuksbmyd.692006","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/selcuksbmyd\/issue\/53906\/692006; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.29249\/selcuksbmyd.692006","title":"Otantik Liderlik Davran\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n ve \u00c7evresel Dinamizmin \u0130\u015fletmelerin \u0130\u00e7 Giri\u015fimcilik E\u011filimi \u00dczerine Etkisi ; The Effect of Authentic Leadership Behavior and Environmental Dynamism on Intrapreneurship","paper_abstract":"\u00c7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131 Konya\u2019da d\u00f6rt ve be\u015f y\u0131ld\u0131zl\u0131 otellerde beyaz yakal\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n otantik liderlik d\u00fczeylerinin ve \u00e7evresel dinamizmin i\u00e7 giri\u015fimcilikleri \u00fczerindeki rol\u00fcn\u00fc belirlemek olmu\u015ftur. Yaz\u0131nda ge\u00e7erlili\u011fi ve g\u00fcvenilirli\u011fi analiz edilen 62 ifadeden olu\u015fan \u00f6l\u00e7ek kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n otantik liderlik alg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131 \u00f6l\u00e7mek amac\u0131yla Walumbwa vd.(2008)\u2019nin geli\u015ftirdi\u011fi \u00f6l\u00e7ek; i\u00e7 giri\u015fimcilik e\u011filimini \u00f6l\u00e7mek amac\u0131yla Antoncic ve Hisrich (2001) taraf\u0131ndan geli\u015ftirilen \u00f6l\u00e7ek; \u00e7evresel dinamizmi \u00f6l\u00e7mek amac\u0131yla Achrol ve Stern (1988) taraf\u0131ndan geli\u015ftirilen \u00f6l\u00e7ek kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Detayl\u0131 literat\u00fcr taramas\u0131 sonucu geli\u015ftirilen hipotezler 143 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan \u00fczerinde test edilmi\u015f ve kabul edilmi\u015ftir. De\u011fi\u015fkenler tan\u0131mlay\u0131c\u0131 istatistiki analize tabi tutularak incelenmi\u015f ve SPSS 24.0 istatistik paket program\u0131 kullan\u0131larak gerekli analizler yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma hipotezlerini test edebilmek amac\u0131yla basit do\u011frusal regresyon analizi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Analiz sonucunda, otantik liderli\u011fin, i\u00e7 giri\u015fimcili\u011fi pozitif y\u00f6nde etkiledi\u011fi sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r (F(1,141)= 147,942, p<.001). Ayr\u0131ca \u00e7evresel dinamizm, i\u015fletmelerin i\u00e7 giri\u015fimcilik e\u011filimini pozitif y\u00f6nde etkilemi\u015ftir (F(1,141)= 189,016, p<.001). ; The aim of the study is to determine the authentic leadership behaviour perception levels of white-collar employees and environmental dynamism on intrapreneurship behavior in four and five star hotels in Konya. The scale developed by Walumbwa et al (2008) to measure authentic leadership perception of employees; the scale developed by Antoncic and Hisrich (2001) to measure the perception of intrapreneurship; the scale developed by Achrol and Stern (1988) to measure environmental dynamism is used. Hypothesis developed after the detailed literature review are tested on 143 employees and accepted. The variables are analyzed using descriptive statistical analysis by SPSS 24.0 program. Hierarchical multiple regression analysis is used to test the research hypotheses. As a result of the analysis, it has been concluded that authentic leadership perception positively affects intrapreneurship (F (1,141) = 147,942, p <.001). Do\u011fdu\u011funda \u0130stanbul\u2019a Latinler h\u00e2kimdi. E\u011fitime \u00f6nem veren bir aileye sahip olan Akropolites, 1233 y\u0131l\u0131nda \u0130znik\u2019e gitti. O s\u0131rada \u0130znik, Bizans \u0130mparatorlu\u011funu ya\u015fatmak isteyen Laskaris \u00f6nderli\u011finde kurulan bir Rum devletinin merkeziydi. Akropolites, burada devlet hizmetine girdi. E\u011fitimi sayesinde devlet kademesinde h\u0131zla y\u00fckseldi. Di\u011fer taraftan ise vekayinamesini yazd\u0131. Yazd\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu eserine 1204 y\u0131l\u0131nda Latinlerin \u0130stanbul\u2019u almas\u0131 ile ba\u015flar. \u0130znik Rum Devletinin i\u00e7 ve d\u0131\u015f olaylar\u0131 hakk\u0131nda bilgiler vererek devam eder. O,1233 y\u0131l\u0131ndan sonra anlatt\u0131\u011f\u0131 olaylara bizzat \u015fahit olmu\u015ftur. G\u0131yaseddin Keyh\u00fcsrev\u2019in \u0130stanbul\u2019a gidi\u015fi ve III.Aleksios ile tan\u0131\u015f\u0131kl\u0131k kurmas\u0131, \u0130znik\u2019te Bizans varisleri devlet kurulduktan sonra Sel\u00e7uklu Sultanlar\u0131n\u0131n \u0130znik ile olan ili\u015fkileri, Ala\u015fehir Muharebesi, K\u00f6seda\u011f Sava\u015f\u0131 ve yans\u0131malar\u0131 Akropolites\u2019in eserinde yer bulur. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131, Akropolites\u2019in eserine g\u00f6re T\u00fcrkiye Sel\u00e7uklular\u0131 ile \u0130znik Rum \u0130mparatorlu\u011fu aras\u0131nda ya\u015fanan ili\u015fkileri anlatmak, Ala\u015fehir ve K\u00f6seda\u011f Sava\u015flar\u0131n\u0131n bu iki devletin ili\u015fkilerini ne y\u00f6nde etkiledi\u011fini ifade etmektir. Esere ba\u011fl\u0131 \u015fekilde olaylar anlat\u0131l\u0131rken, kimi zaman ya\u015fananlar\u0131n daha net anla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u00e7in ek a\u00e7\u0131klamalar yap\u0131lacakt\u0131r. Bazen de Akropolites\u2019in anlatt\u0131\u011f\u0131 olaylar, \u0130bn Bibi (Sel\u00e7ukname) ve Aksarayi\u2019(M\u00fcsameret\u00fc\u2019l Ahbar)nin eserleri ile kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lacakt\u0131r. B\u00f6ylece bir Bizans kayna\u011f\u0131 ile \u0130slam kaynaklar\u0131n\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 da yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olacakt\u0131r. Bunlara da dipnotlarda yer verilecektir. ; Akropolites, was born (Constantinopolis) Istanbul in 1217. When he was born, Istanbul was ruled by Latins. Akropolites who had a family that cared about education, went to Iznik in 1233. In those years, Iznik was the center of a Rum state founded under the leadership of Laskaris who wanted to keep the Byzantine Empire alive. Akropolites entered government service here. Thanks to his education, he rose rapidly through the ranks of the state. On the one hand he wrote chronicle. His chronicle begins in 1204 when the Latins conquer Istanbul. Continuing by giving information aboute internal and external events of the Empire of Nicaea. He witnessed the events he described after 1233. Among the subjects in the work of the Akropolites are contacts between G\u0131yaseddin Keyh\u00fcsrev and III. Aleksios, relations of the Seljuk Sultans with Iznik, Antiokheia Battle, K\u00f6seda\u011f Battle and its reflections. The aim of this study, to explain the relations between the Sultanate of Rum and the Empire of Nicaea according to the Akropolites\u2019s Chronicle, to express how the battles of Antiokheia and K\u00f6seda\u011f affected the relations of these two state. While explaining event according to the Chronicle, from time to time additional explanations will be made for a better understanding of events. Sometimes the events described by Akropolites will be compared with the books of \u0130bn Bibi (Sel\u00e7ukname) and Aksarayi (M\u00fcsameret\u00fc\u2019l Ahbar). Thus a comparison of a Byzantine source with native sources will be made.","published_in":"Volume: 3, Issue: 1 22-36 ; 2667-4882 ; Orta\u00e7a\u011f Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 Dergisi","year":"2020-06-25T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"T\u00fcrkiye Sel\u00e7uklular\u0131,\u0130znik Rum \u0130mparatorlu\u011fu,Ala\u015fehir Sava\u015f\u0131,K\u00f6seda\u011f Sava\u015f\u0131,Mo\u011follar","subject":"T\u00fcrkiye Sel\u00e7uklular\u0131,\u0130znik Rum \u0130mparatorlu\u011fu,Ala\u015fehir Sava\u015f\u0131,K\u00f6seda\u011f Sava\u015f\u0131,Mo\u011follar","authors":"K\u00dcSG\u00dcN, Okan","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/oad\/issue\/55227\/696293","oa_state":"2","url":"e7e79f4306a4184c911b5c2860c3e09856efc858975963e2e9d39d7631beae02","relevance":56},{"id":"caedb6ee6eff79f5625c7910f8c5ec93a955d0b9f03e7a237577a98c9379fe20","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1067465; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/izsbd\/issue\/52269\/708586","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/izsbd\/issue\/52269\/708586","title":"Yolsuzlukla M\u00fccadele: Se\u00e7ilmi\u015f \u00dclke \u00d6rnekleri ; Fight Against Corruption: Selected Country Examples","paper_abstract":"Yolsuzluk, k\u00fcresel anlamda \u00fczerinde en \u00e7ok tart\u0131\u015f\u0131lan ve m\u00fccadele edebilmek i\u00e7in \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm yollar\u0131 aranan en temel sorunlardan bir tanesidir. Yolsuzlu\u011fu bir kal\u0131p i\u00e7erisine koyarak de\u011ferlendirmek yanl\u0131\u015f olacakt\u0131r. Ulusal ve uluslararas\u0131 d\u00fczeyde ciddi bir sorun olarak alg\u0131lanan yolsuzlu\u011fa dair net bir tan\u0131m yap\u0131lamamaktad\u0131r. Ekonomideki en temel varsay\u0131m rasyonel insan\u0131n, kendi faydas\u0131n\u0131 maksimize etmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131d\u0131r. Kendi faydas\u0131n\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnen bu bireyler ise toplumu olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Zira yolsuzluk, temelinde insan\u0131n oldu\u011fu her alanda ve her an kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131kmakta ve t\u00fcm topluma mal olmaktad\u0131r. Her alanda oldu\u011fu gibi ekonomi alan\u0131nda da yolsuzluk, y\u0131k\u0131c\u0131 etkilerini beraberinde getirmi\u015ftir. Zaman i\u00e7erisinde giderek kontrolden \u00e7\u0131kan ve insafs\u0131zca artan menfaat kavgas\u0131, \u00f6zellikle son d\u00f6nemde ve globalle\u015fmenin de r\u00fczg\u00e2r\u0131yla \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fclemeyen boyutlara ula\u015fm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.Bu \u00e7er\u00e7evede makalenin amac\u0131 yolsuzluk olgusuna de\u011finerek se\u00e7ilmi\u015f baz\u0131 \u00fclkelerin yolsuzlu\u011fa kar\u015f\u0131 alm\u0131\u015f olduklar\u0131 \u00f6nlemleri incelemektir. Bu anlamda yolsuzluk kavram\u0131 tan\u0131mlanarak yolsuzluk olarak nitelendirilebilmesi i\u00e7in bulundurmas\u0131 gereken unsurlara ve \u00f6zelliklerine de\u011finilmi\u015ftir. Yolsuzluk \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fclebildi\u011finden bahisle \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fc sistemleri irdelenmi\u015f ve uluslararas\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rma \u015firketlerinin endekslerine g\u00f6re makaleye konu \u00fclkelerin yolsuzluk alan\u0131nda s\u0131ralamas\u0131 k\u0131yaslanabilmi\u015ftir. \u00d6rneklendirilen \u00fclkelerin yolsuzluk konusunda alm\u0131\u015f olduklar\u0131 \u00f6nlemler ortaya konularak ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 olup olmad\u0131klar\u0131 de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonucunda yolsuzluklar kontrol edilmedi\u011fi s\u00fcrece kamu sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnden \u00f6zel sekt\u00f6re \u00fclkenin her alan\u0131na yay\u0131labilen bir olgu oldu\u011fundan \u00fczerinde ciddi olarak durulmas\u0131 gereklili\u011fi ifade edilmi\u015ftir. Mutlak ba\u015far\u0131 isteniliyorsa ba\u015fta yolsuzlukla m\u00fccadeleye y\u00f6nelik yasalar koyarak herkesin bunlara mutlak itaat etmesi sa\u011flanmal\u0131d\u0131r. Sadece bir alanda m\u00fccadele yeterli olmayacak, toplumu da bu m\u00fccadeleye ortak ederek devletin \u00f6nderli\u011finde t\u00fcm sekt\u00f6rlerle bu sorunu ortadan kald\u0131rmaya y\u00f6nelik \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar yap\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi tespit edilmi\u015ftir. ; Corruption, on which is debated and searched for solutions to struggle with in global terms, is one of the most basic issues. It would be wrong to estimate corruption by stereotyping. A clear definition of the corruption which is sensed as a critical issue at the national and international level. The most fundamental hypothesis in economy is that a rational person tries to maximize his\/her own benefit.Those people who thinks of their own benefit constitute the society. In as much as, corruption is confronted and it cost to society. As being in every field, it brings the destructive effects in economy. The conflict of interest, which is getting more and more cruelly and getting out of control, has recently reached unforeseen dimensions by the wave of globalisation.Within this scope, the aim of this article is to analyze the corruption in detail. In this sense, corruptionn is defined and also detailed information about the characteristic of corruption being as corruption is mentioned. Due to the fact that corruption can be gauged, the metric systems are scrutinized and according to the indexes of international research companies, the sorting of the countries which are mentioned in the article can be compared. It is evalvated by analyzing the precautions about corruption that whether the sample countries have been succesfull or not. As the research result, corruption ought to be struggled with because it is a serious issue which is discarsed and it can expend from state sector to private sector when it is not controlled. If absolute success is wished, laws ought to be legislated to struggle which corruption and everyone ought to obey them. It is determined that sruggling with corruption will be not enough in only one field, and under the leadership of the goverment in each sector, studies which are to dispose the problem have to be done via associating with society.","published_in":"Volume: 2, Issue: 1 30-41 ; 2687-4407 ; \u0130zmir Sosyal Bilimler Dergisi","year":"2020-06-30T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Yolsuzluk,Ekonomi,K\u00fcreselle\u015fme,M\u00fccadele; Corruption,Economy,Globalization,Struggle","subject":"Yolsuzluk,Ekonomi,K\u00fcreselle\u015fme,M\u00fccadele; Corruption,Economy,Globalization,Struggle","authors":"\u0130\u015eLER, Kutay; TUTAR, Filiz","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/izsbd\/issue\/52269\/708586","oa_state":"2","url":"caedb6ee6eff79f5625c7910f8c5ec93a955d0b9f03e7a237577a98c9379fe20","relevance":55},{"id":"0f8cd3ce4260db7ae5768a60c2933b8e861740024e7eb063d87d7c613825568c","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1179450; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/serd\/issue\/55559\/714249","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/serd\/issue\/55559\/714249","title":"A reflective coaching model in teacher evaluation ; \u00d6\u011fretmen denetiminde yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 denetim modeli","paper_abstract":"Considering the recent developments in teacher competency and evaluation in the Education 4.0, this study proposes a supervision model named as \u2018Reflective Coaching\u2019 mainly based on principles of Schon (1983) and a research study conducted by the researchers entitled \u2018The Impact of Reflective Coaching on Development of Teaching Skills of the Teacher Candidates\u2019in 2017. The current supervision system in Turkey fails to address professional development needs of teachers and they face difficulties finding reflective learning environments, in which they would have opportunities to develop their teaching skills. When examined the insufficient numbers of supervisors, their actual work loads, and recent innovative and leadership based learning opportunities, a new teacher evaluation model is needed to address the the new teacher competencies. Through this formative teacher development model, teachers will be able to review their practices from a stand point of reflective view based on action research and self-evaluation. They will also find opportunities to evalate their weaknesses and strengths and seek new learning environments to develop themselves professionally. Within this model, new portfolios will be created, micro-teaching practices will be video-recorded, and efficent feedback and post-conference sessions will be organized for the teachers to self-evaluate their actual teaching performance. They will all be conducted considering action-research-based tasks and activities and teachers will gain a better understanding of how new evaluation forms should be developed. ; End\u00fcstri 4.0 ile ba\u015flayan ve bili\u015fim teknolojisi ile birlikte s\u0131n\u0131f ve \u00f6\u011frenme ortamlar\u0131na ta\u015f\u0131nan, yeni \u00f6\u011frenme ortamlar\u0131, dijital s\u0131n\u0131flar ve g\u00f6rsel unsurlar\u0131n egemen olaca\u011f\u0131 ortamlarda, \u00f6\u011fretmen ve denetmen yeterlik ve standartlar\u0131n\u0131 yeniden olu\u015fturmak gerekmektedir. Bu geli\u015fme ve yans\u0131malar\u0131n hayat bulaca\u011f\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fimler, E\u011fitim 4.0 b\u00fcnyesinde olu\u015fturulan yeni \u00f6\u011frenme hedeflerinin \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcl\u00fcp de\u011ferlendirilmesi 1983 y\u0131l\u0131nda Schon taraf\u0131ndan kavramsalla\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lan yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6\u011frenme ve \u00f6\u011fretmenlik ile birlikte yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 denetim kavram\u0131n\u0131 da g\u00fcndeme getirmi\u015ftir. T\u00fcrkiye\u2019deki mevcut denetim sisteminin bu beklentilere yan\u0131t vermekten uzak kalmas\u0131 nedeniyle, \u00f6\u011fretmen-temelli yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 denetim uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n geli\u015ftirilmesi gerekmektedir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma, E\u011fitim 4.0 temelinde, olu\u015fturulabilecek bir yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 denetim modeli \u00f6nermektedir. Bu model, temelini ve kavramsal \u00e7er\u00e7evesini Schon taraf\u0131ndan 1983 yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnme ilkeleri ile 2017 y\u0131l\u0131nda yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 ko\u00e7luk olarak geli\u015ftirmi\u015f oldu\u011fumuz bir model ile ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirdi\u011fimiz \u2018Yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 Ko\u00e7lu\u011fun \u00d6\u011fretmen Adaylar\u0131n\u0131n \u00d6\u011fretmenlik Becerilerinin Geli\u015ftirilmesine Etkisi\u2019 adl\u0131 ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonu\u00e7lar\u0131ndan almaktad\u0131r. Bu normatif model ile birlikte, yeterli say\u0131da olmayan denetmenler, denetmenlerin i\u015f y\u00fckleri, ve e\u011fitim ortamlar\u0131nda ger\u00e7ekle\u015fen bu ba\u015f d\u00f6nd\u00fcr\u00fcc\u00fc giri\u015fimcilik ve liderlik gerektiren yeni yeterlik alanlar\u0131 g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcne al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131nda, \u00f6\u011fretmen odakl\u0131 yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 \u00f6z-de\u011ferlendirmenin \u00f6n planda oldu\u011fu bir denetim ve de\u011ferlendirme sisteminin ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131 hedeflenmektedir. \u00d6\u011fretmenler, bu model ile birlikte kendi ger\u00e7ek \u00f6\u011fretme ortamlar\u0131n\u0131 nas\u0131l de\u011ferlendirecekleri konusunda \u00f6n planda tutulacaklard\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma ile birlikte, \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin hem \u00f6\u011frenme hem de \u00f6\u011fretme ortamlar\u0131na yans\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 ve ele\u015ftirel bir g\u00f6z ile bakmalar\u0131 sa\u011flanarak, eylem ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 temelinde \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin, \u00f6z-de\u011ferlendirme portfolyolar\u0131 olu\u015fturmas\u0131, mikro-\u00f6\u011fretmenlik uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n kaydedilmesi, de\u011ferlendirme formlar\u0131n\u0131n haz\u0131rlanmas\u0131 ba\u011flam\u0131nda \u00f6nemli kazan\u0131mlar elde etmelerine katk\u0131 sa\u011flanmas\u0131 hedeflenmektedir.","published_in":"Volume: 4, Issue: 1 26-41 ; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/optimum\/issue\/55026\/714678","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/optimum\/issue\/55026\/714678","title":"G\u00fc\u00e7lendirici Liderlik ve Bilgi Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n \u00d6rg\u00fct ve \u00d6rg\u00fct \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131 \u00dczerine Etkilerinin \u0130ncelenmesi ; Evaluation of Empowering Leadership and Knowledge Sharing on Organization and Organization Employees","paper_abstract":"Dinamik bir yap\u0131ya sahip olan hizmet sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde bilgi ve bilgi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 olduk\u00e7a \u00f6nemlidir. Bilgi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar aras\u0131nda verimli yap\u0131lmas\u0131 i\u015flerin do\u011fru yap\u0131lmas\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan da \u00f6nemlidir. Bilgi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n istenilen seviyede verimli olabilmesi i\u00e7in liderlik \u00f6zellikleri \u00f6n plana \u00e7\u0131kabilmektedir. G\u00fc\u00e7lendirici liderli\u011fin \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar \u00fczerinde olumlu y\u00f6nde etkisinin oldu\u011fu a\u00e7\u0131klanabilmektedir. Bu kapsam da, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131 hizmet sekt\u00f6r\u00fcn de (lojistik firmalar\u0131) g\u00fc\u00e7lendirici liderlik, bilgi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan performans\u0131, \u00f6rg\u00fct performans\u0131 ve i\u015f performans\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fkenleri aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkilerin analiz edilmesidir. Analizler sonucunda; g\u00fc\u00e7lendirici liderli\u011fin ve bilgi payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n; \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan performans\u0131, \u00f6rg\u00fctsel performans\u0131 ve i\u015f performans\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fkenlerine olumlu y\u00f6nde etkisi oldu\u011fu tespit edilmi\u015ftir. G\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fcl\u00fck esas\u0131na dayal\u0131 olarak lojistik firmalar\u0131nda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan beyaz yakal\u0131 386 personele anket uygulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. SPSS 25 ve LISREL 8.80 programlar\u0131 kullan\u0131larak elde edilen veriler de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir. De\u011fi\u015fkenleri temsil eden \u00f6l\u00e7eklerle ilgili olarak fakt\u00f6r ve g\u00fcvenirlilik analizi yap\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra, korelasyon analizi, hipotezlerin test edilmesinde regresyon analizi ve sobel testi de arac\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fken etkisinin analizi i\u00e7in yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. ; Knowledge and knowledge sharing is very important in the service sector, which has a dynamic structure. It is also important to share knowledg efficiently among employees in order to get things right. The aim of the study is to examine the impact of empowering leadership and knowledg sharing in terms of performance criterias in the service sector (logistics companies). As a result of surveys collected from logistics companies, the effect of empowering leadership and knowledge sharing on employee performance, organizational performance and job performance variables were determined. In the scope of aim of the study, a survey was conducted with 386 personnel working in the logistic companies. Data analysis was done using SPSS 25 and LISREL 8.80 programs. After factor and reliability analyses, correlation analysis, regression analysis were performed and also sobel test was done for the analysis of measuring the mediating variable effect.","published_in":"Volume: 7, Issue: 2 593-612 ;
