\u0421\u043e\u0446\u0438\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0435\u043a\u0442 \u043a\u0430\u043a \u0442\u0435\u0445\u043d\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0433\u0438\u044f \u0440\u0430\u0437\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0438\u044f \u043b\u0438\u0434\u0435\u0440\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043a\u0430\u0447\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0432 \u0441\u043e\u0432\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0441\u0442\u0443\u0434\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0430 The article shows the potential of a social project in the formation of leadership qualities in students. The essence of a social project is revealed, the stages of its implementation are shown. The author focuses on the concept of leadership, considers the key qualities of a leader. One of the demanded qualities of a leader in modern life is his active life position, which is expressed in the conscious realization of his social roles. Social project facilitates the development of such activity. We used social project as a technology for the development of leadership qualities in students. To that end, we have conducted a survey among the students of the faculty of service, tourism, and technology of public catering (N=69) with the aim to reveal the leadership skills. The results of testing showed insufficient development of these skills. We have assumed that the participation of students in the development and realization of the social project would foster more intensive development of leadership qualities. The realization of the social project \u201cSupporting of persons with impaired mobility in city infrastructure\u201d under the guidance of teachers and experts has justified the efficiency of the implemented technology. Upon the project completion the students demonstrated better results in four positions. ; \u0412 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u044c\u0435 \u0440\u0430\u0441\u0441\u043c\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043d\u044b \u0441\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0435\u043c\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0437\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0434\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0445. ; Research Methodology. The article\u2019s research used the historical and comparative-historical methods, systematization, classification and grouping, content analysis method.Results. Studies of journalistic practice confirm that the most widespread use of public opinion polls in the media, especially during election campaigns, results of monitoring studies of various parameters of the life of the population are less frequently covered. Summarizing the results of research into current practices in the use of non-survey methods of data collection in sociology, we can conclude that, despite the significant development of this area of research, the experience of their use is quite limited. Most often they are auxiliary sources of sociological data, while questionnaires retain leadership positions. A feature of contemporary international research is its high polyphonic methods, which include online surveys, computer, telephone and paper interviews, which are approximately equally represented. At the same time, domestic research is dominated by personal interviews and in-depth interviews. In addition, combining research methods is a common practice in public opinion research. The analysis of the level of use of scientific methods and the correspondence of the reality of the practice of coverage of sociological research data in journalistic activity is carried out. The problem of unprofessional or impartial interpretation of sociological research data has been studied, which leads to distortion of the content and results of certain surveys. A certain set of methods of empirical researches which are applied depending on the outlined purpose and tasks in journalistic practice are considered. The most common practices of using the latest non-survey methods of data collection for different categories of population are highlighted. Recommendations were given on the interpretation of the results of public opinion polls and their impartial presentation in the media.Novelty. The article analyzes the level of use of scientific methods and the correspondence of the reality of the practice of the use of sociological research data in journalistic activity.The practical significance. The results of the study can be used to improve the level of professionalism of using sociological research data in the information space.Key words: general population, sources of information, public opinion research, journalistic activity, systematization of data.  \u0414\u0435\u0440\u0436\u0430\u0432\u0430 \u0442\u0430 \u0440\u0435\u0433\u0456\u043e\u043d\u0438. \u0421\u0435\u0440\u0456\u044f: C\u043e\u0446\u0456\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457; No 4(40) (2019); 44-48 ; \u0413\u043e\u0441\u0443\u0434\u0430\u0440\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e \u0438 \u0440\u0435\u0433\u0438\u043e\u043d\u044b. \u0421\u0435\u0440\u0438\u044f: \u042d\u043a\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043c\u0438\u043a\u0430 \u0438 \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043f\u0440\u0438\u043d\u0438\u043c\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e; No 4(40) (2019); 44-48 ; State and Regions. Series: Social Communications; No 4(40) (2019); 44-48 ; 2219-8741 Kodatska, N.; Yatchuk, O.; Lesiuk, O."},{"id":"b4f1cb8a4f2715ec30aa34ba4bded60d9cfcadd0fc0fe86641162ae5b4ffcff3","content":"Development and testing of an instrument (HeSoEduCo) for health and social care educators' competence in professional education Background. Health and social care education is highly important for preparing future professionals for their future roles in sustainable health and social care. However, previous studies have emphasized that health and social care educators' competence is complex and poorly defined. Thus, there is a clear need for a psychometrically validated instrument to enable clarification and assessment of the required skills. Objective. To develop and psychometrically validate an instrument (the HeSoEduCo) for assessing health and social care educators' competence in higher and professional education. Design. Cross-sectional study. Methods. A HeSoEduCo instrument, with items inviting 1\u20134 Likert scale responses, was developed, based on one systematic review and one qualitative study, then validated in terms of face, content and construct validity and internal consistency (Cronbach's alpha values). All health and social care educators based in all 21 universities of applied sciences in Finland and seven vocational colleges were subsequently invited to participate in a large-scale application of the instrument in fall 2018. In total, responses of 390 of these educators are analyzed here. Results: The face and content validity of 71 newly developed items were assessed by experts in two evaluation rounds. The final content validity showed high scores for the instrument's relevance and clarity. Confirmatory factor analysis (to test construct validity) yielded eight factors (43-items remaining), defining the following competence areas of educators: evidence-based practice, digital collaborative learning, student-centered pedagogy, collaboration & societal, leadership & management, cultural & linguistic diversity, mentoring student into professional competence development and subject & curriculum. Cronbach's alpha values for the factors ranged from 0.70 to 0.89. Conclusion. The instrument can be used to obtain self-evaluations of educators' competence when assessing their general competence levels and help human resources departments and managers to identify suitable continuous education programs for their staff. ; peerReviewed health care; social care; instrument development; statistical testing; competence; educator; mittarit (mittaus); ammatilliset opettajat; sosiaaliala; ammatillinen koulutus; terveysala; kompetenssi  Mikkonen, Kristina; Tuomikoski, Anna-Maria; Sj\u00f6gren, Tuulikki; Koivula, Meeri; Koskim\u00e4ki, Minna; L\u00e4hteenm\u00e4ki, Marja-Leena; M\u00e4ki-Hakola, Hanne; Wallin, Outi; Sormunen, Marjorita; Saaranen, Terhi; Koskinen, Camilla; Koskinen, Monika; Salminen, Leena; Holopainen, Arja; K\u00e4\u00e4ri\u00e4inen, Maria"},{"id":"b64314d126af4f8560b5320b5ca0e7441db1506f617cc3acd8e5cde52e770ad6","content":"STAGES OF FORMATION AND PROBLEMS OF INSTITUTIONALIZATION OF THE POLITICAL OPPOSITION IN UKRAINE ; \u042d\u0422\u0410\u041f\u042b \u0424\u041e\u0420\u041c\u0418\u0420\u041e\u0412\u0410\u041d\u0418\u042f \u0418 \u041f\u0420\u041e\u0411\u041b\u0415\u041c\u042b \u0418\u041d\u0421\u0422\u0418\u0422\u0423\u0426\u0418\u041e\u041d\u0410\u041b\u0418\u0417\u0410\u0426\u0418\u0418 \u041f\u041e\u041b\u0418\u0422\u0418\u0427\u0415\u0421\u041a\u041e\u0419 \u041e\u041f\u041f\u041e\u0417\u0418\u0426\u0418\u0418 \u0412 \u0423\u041a\u0420\u0410\u0418\u041d\u0415 ; \u0415\u0422\u0410\u041f\u0418 \u0424\u041e\u0420\u041c\u0423\u0412\u0410\u041d\u041d\u042f \u0422\u0410 \u041f\u0420\u041e\u0411\u041b\u0415\u041c\u0418 \u0406\u041d\u0421\u0422\u0418\u0422\u0423\u0426\u0406\u041e\u041d\u0410\u041b\u0406\u0417\u0410\u0426\u0406\u0407 \u041f\u041e\u041b\u0406\u0422\u0418\u0427\u041d\u041e\u0407 \u041e\u041f\u041e\u0417\u0418\u0426\u0406\u0407 \u0412 \u0423\u041a\u0420\u0410\u0407\u041d\u0406 The scientific novelty of the research. The basic condition of modern democracy is the existence of the political opposition, which controls the actions of the current government. At this stage of establishment the democratic postulates especially acute question of legislative regulation of the political opposition in Ukraine. The current political opposition that exists in the country is not fulfilling its constructive function continuously. The opposition has not become an effective part of the political system yet. Therefore, the relevant question is theoretical outlines the main stages of its formation, development and activities constantly learn and adjust process of the opposition in the political system of Ukraine. The main objective is considered the main historical stages of the political opposition in Ukraine, analyzed the features of drafting legislation on the parliamentary opposition, identified the main one, outlined the main issues and vectors of the process of institutionalization of political opposition in Ukraine. Methodology. In this research the author used such scientific methods as observation, comparison, analysis, induction and deduction, simulation, systemic and structural-activities approach. Conclusion. The impetus for the formation of the opposition was the independence and start building a democratic and pluralistic state. Today the development of democracy in Ukraine faced a number of problems establishing political opposition. Among them \u2013 the lack of consensus in politics, the weakness of the opposition leadership, lack of human resource capacity of senior officials, the shortcomings of political reform uncertain business opposition, the lack of financial security parliamentary parties of the opposition, the lack of legal regulation of opposition activity and low level of democratic political culture. Results. minority status should be determined by a separate law, rather than changes to the Verkhovna Rada and other regulations; \u2013 Subjects should be the parliamentary opposition faction or their \u043f\u043e\u0432\u2019\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u0437 \u0423\u043a\u0440\u0430\u0457\u043d\u043e\u044e, \u0443 \u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u043e\u0432\u043e\u043c\u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0435\u043a\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0437\u0430\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0436\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0430\u0432\u0456\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457. ; The article deals with the processes of formation of organizational structures,which later became the basis of the military aviation command and control organization as a component of the armed forces of the leading countries of the world in the late 19th \u2014 early 20th centuries before the World War I. The author also reveals the processes that took place in the armed forces of European countries since the be- ginning of the aerostatic type aircraft using for conducting air reconnaissance dur- ing the Napoleonic wars since the end of the 18th century. The first times of aircraft combat using are described and their results are estimated by contemporaries of the events under consideration. It is being considered the organizational activity of the military-political leadership of the states, public organizations, individual persons and determined their influence on the development of aeronautics, aircraft indus- try, creation of the first aviation units, military aviation schools and deployment of technical personnel training, in particular, on the territory of Ukraine, which at that time was part of the Russian Empire. In addition, emphasis was placed on a number of features of command and control organizations responsible for the development of aviation in the armed forces of the leading countries of the world at that time, namely, laying responsibility for the development of aviation on the command and control organizations of high-tech troops (special forces), predominance in their activity functions of maintenance management and aviation equipment ordering, lack in their activities an aviation units operational management functions, which was observed before the World War I. The contribution of some Ukrainian-related military, state and public personalities in the global context of aviation genesis also being appropriately addressed. \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u043e\u044f\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043d\u0430 \u0414\u043e\u043d\u0431\u0430\u0441\u0456\u043d\u0430 \u043d\u0430\u0432\u0435\u0441\u043d\u0456 2014 \u0440. ; Events that took place on the East of Ukraine after Maidan and the conquest of Crimea by Russia are considered as separatism movement, which has become a military conflict. However, there is still no clear difference between these notions, as these events haven\u2019t been studied and rethought enough. On this regard, the social \u2014 political and violent confrontation on Donbas in February \u2014 June 2014 has been analyzed and represented in the article, by the example of Mariupol \u2014 a city of Azov region with thousands people.Based on the received information it has been found out that events on Donbas was difficult and ambiguous page in the Ukrainian history, which needs to be stud- ied profoundly and without prejudice. It has been discovered that a part of mar- ginal social organizations together with Communist Party of Ukraine, being col- laborators, were supporting the Pro-Russian movement. However, their aim was ambiguous, as each of them was following their own goal \u2014 some were inviting Russian military forces to Mariupol, another part sought to join Russian Federa- tion, some wanted an autonomy for Donbas as a part of Ukraine. The local power, striving to keep peace and safety in the city, at the same time was supporting a part of the Pro-Russian demands, in order to put a pressure on the central authority and to keep its influence on the positions in such a way. However, as opposed to the Pro-Russian the part of Mariupol\u2019s population, with the support of political parties, whose leaders were in power in Kyiv, were speaking out against the aggression of Russian Federation and standing for the territorial integrity of Ukraine.Nonetheless, social political conflict grew into the forceful confrontation when sabotage groups, managed by Russian special services, occupied a number of cit- ies of Donbas, which has led to the creation of \u201cDNR\u201d. It has been specified that the capture of Mariupol by the militants was successful due to the organized provocation on the 9th May, when during the forceful confrontation between Ukrainian military forces and \u201cDNR\u201d collaborators the local population has suffered. The last one has woken a social resonance in the city. On this regard, the Ukrainian military leadership took a decision to retreat from the city, and when the occupa- tional power has revealed its true colors \u2014 terror, looting, kidnapping \u2014 social attitudes have changed. It gave an opportunity to lead a successful operation on liberation of the city. \u0414\u041d\u0420; \u041c\u0430\u0440\u0456\u0443\u043f\u043e\u043b\u044c; \u043c\u0456\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433; \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0456\u0439\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0456 \u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0438; \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0442\u0438\u0441\u0442\u043e- \u044f\u043d\u043d\u044f; \u0440\u0435\u0444\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0434\u0443\u043c; DNR; Mariupol; rally; pro-russian activists; confrontation; referendum Military Historical Bulletin; \u0422\u043e\u043c 33, \u2116 3 (2019): ; 5-22 ; \u0412\u043e\u0454\u043d\u043d\u043e-\u0456\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0447\u043d\u0438\u0439 \u0432\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u043a; \u0422\u043e\u043c 33, \u2116 3 (2019): \u0412\u043e\u0454\u043d\u043d\u043e-\u0456\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0447\u043d\u0438\u0439 \u0432\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u043a; 5-22 ; 2707-1391 ; 2707-1383 Benchuk, V.O."},{"id":"5cf67874d18e97ab068185303c3652ae2fc11e49be70292444d11bac5012bcaf","content":"Contemporary Leadership Theories: Humanistic Perspective ; \u0421\u0443\u0447\u0430\u0441\u043d\u0456 \u0442\u0435\u043e\u0440\u0456\u0457 \u043b\u0456\u0434\u0435\u0440\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0430: \u0433\u0443\u043c\u0430\u043d\u0456\u0441\u0442\u0438\u0447\u043d\u0438\u0439 \u0440\u0430\u043a\u0443\u0440\u0441 Basic concepts of leadership that emerged in the late XX \u2013 early XXI centuries areanalyzed in the article. The role and position of a leader in accordance with theteam he \/ she leads is examined. The aim of the article is to identify theoreticalaspects of the leadership phenomenon. To identify the peculiarities of thephenomenon, special attention is paid to the theories of humanistic direction.In the realization of the purpose of this article the theoretical methodsof research were used: analysis of psychological literature; systematization,generalization, structuring of data of theoretical concepts.The results of the research suggest that it has been determined thateffective leader mediates between the organization and the individual in order toensure the achievements of the company and meet the needs of the individual ingrowth and self-development (C. Argyris), demonstrate empathy, attentiveness in the perception of new information, the ability to respond to it and depends onthe development of emotional intelligence (D. Goleman, R. Boyatzis, A. McKee),care for needs of his followers, serve them and help in achieving individual andteam goals (R. Greenleaf). It has been researched that Uniqueness, authenticity,leadership presence are the keys to successful leadership in the model byJ. Scouller. These qualities of a leader are also underlined by B. George andS. Friedman.As a conclusion the necessity of conducting empirical research to observeadvantages of contemporary leadership theories are noted and the importanceof determining peculiarities of leadership Behaviors in Financial Sector: A Moderated Mediation Analysis A growing body of literature is focused on analyzing the impact of leadership styles on various organizational behaviors. Although in knowledge management literature studies have shown a statistically significant impact of any leadership style on knowledge sharing but the literature on hiding is still scarce. This study is an attempt to bridge this gap in literature by focusing on ethical leadership and the impact it has on the knowledge sharing and knowledge hiding of the employees. Organizational citizenship behavior is included as mediator in the study as it is observed from past literature that employees like to emulate the behavior of their supervisor. The model of the research study will also be tested for the moderation effects of procedural justice. It is expected that ethicality of the leader will result in higher organizational citizenship behavior which in turn will enhance the knowledge sharing and hinder the knowledge hiding behavior of the employees. It is also expected that procedural justice will moderate the relationship.  International Journal of Science and Business 4(3) 56-69 Khola Masood"},{"id":"e74e4ae1b7a28c435d170d3716e0b1f28cb2b2814d2950fb3895917b77b2274e","content":"Infinite Income Plan a System That Works For You! De nos jours, des nombreuses femmes de par leurs comp\u00e9tences ne poursuivent pas leur parcours professionnel. La question de la r\u00e9partition des r\u00f4les et responsabilit\u00e9s sociaux entre les hommes et les femmes constitue une barri\u00e8re \u00e0 l\u2019exercice du leadership f\u00e9minin. Cet article fait ressortir les obstacles auxquels font face les femmes responsables dans l\u2019exercice du leadership. En d\u2019autres termes, en fondant notre analyse sur le param\u00e8tre genre, cet article cherche \u00e0 comprendre en profondeur les difficult\u00e9s rencontr\u00e9es par les femmes responsables dans l\u2019exercice du leadership au sein de l\u2019Universit\u00e9. A partir des entretiens semi-directifs conduits aupr\u00e8s de 15 femmes responsables au sein de l\u2019Universit\u00e9 de Ngaound\u00e9r\u00e9, il en ressort que la conciliation vie priv\u00e9e\/vie professionnelle, la non valorisation des comp\u00e9tences, les conditions de travail et le manque de consid\u00e9ration de la part de leurs coll\u00e8gues hommes sont les difficult\u00e9s majeures \u00e0 l\u2019exercice du leadership f\u00e9minin. Leadership f\u00e9minin; obstacles; femmes responsables; genre; Universit\u00e9  Hamadou BOUKAR; HABIBA Mal Ibrahima"},{"id":"8fb2ea3812faf6794b7216ebdbfbfc19e9d0bea3fe67066937b275cb6725023c","content":"The Importance of the Report Prepeared by Ignatiev Mission for the Russian Occupations in Turkistan ; Rusya\u2019n\u0131n T\u00fcrkistan\u2019\u0131 \u0130\u015fgalinde \u0130gnatiyev Heyeti\u2019nin Haz\u0131rlam\u0131\u015f Oldu\u011fu Raporun \u00d6nemi In the second half of the XIX.century, technology and capital emerged with the industrial revolution, and there were changes in the relations of power and wealth in the world.It is a period when Russian occupations gained momentum in Turkestan. In addition to the fact that Turkestan khanates could not keep up with this change, the disagreements within themselves facilitated the invasion of the Russians. Russia wanted to obtain detailed information about the region through its representatives before the occupation.In 1858 by the Russian Tsarwas commissioned to prepare reports on the region of Turkestan a delegation of 82 people under the leadership of Colonel Ignatiyev. This committee has examined the economic, political and strategic features of Turkestan on the spot and gathered detailed information about the states in the region. In addition to the characteristics of the region, a report was prepared by the experts on the military, political and economic situation of the states in the region. Ignatiyev, in his report, it was stated that Russia could easily occupy Turkestan khanates by taking advantage of the disagreement between the Khanates and could increase this dispute.In the aftermath of this work, Ignatiyev was promoted to the rank of general and Russia's progress towards Turkestan gained momentum. As a matter of fact, it is seen in the following period that Russia occupied the region by taking advantage of the disagreement between the khanates without requiring military power at some points. In this study, information about the report prepared by the Ignatiyev delegation was given and were discussed the effects of this report on the occupation strategy of Russia. ; XIX. y\u00fczy\u0131l\u0131n ikinci yar\u0131s\u0131nda ya\u015fanan end\u00fcstriyel devrimle teknoloji ve sermaye ortaya \u00e7\u0131km\u0131\u015f, d\u00fcnyadaki g\u00fc\u00e7 ve zenginlik ili\u015fkilerinde de\u011fi\u015fiklikler olmu\u015ftur. XIX. y\u00fczy\u0131l T\u00fcrkistan\u2019da Rus i\u015fgallerinin h\u0131z kazand\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir d\u00f6nem olup T\u00fcrkistan hanl\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131n bu de\u011fi\u015fime ayak uyduramamas\u0131n\u0131n yan\u0131 s\u0131ra kendi i\u00e7lerinde ya\u015fad\u0131klar\u0131 anla\u015fmazl\u0131klar Ruslar\u0131n i\u015fgalini kolayla\u015ft\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Rusya, i\u015fgal \u00f6ncesi b\u00f6lgeye g\u00f6nderdi\u011fi temsilciler arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131yla b\u00f6lge hakk\u0131nda detayl\u0131 bilgi edinmek istemi\u015ftir. Rus \u00c7ar\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan 1858 y\u0131l\u0131nda Albay \u0130gnatiyev \u00f6nc\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde 82 ki\u015filik bir heyet T\u00fcrkistan b\u00f6lgesi hakk\u0131nda rapor haz\u0131rlamak \u00fczere g\u00f6revlendirilmi\u015ftir. Bu heyet T\u00fcrkistan\u2019\u0131n iktisadi, siyasi ve stratejik \u00f6zelliklerini yerinde inceleyerek burada bulunan devletler hakk\u0131nda detayl\u0131 bilgi toplam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Heyetteki uzmanlar taraf\u0131ndan b\u00f6lgenin \u00f6zelliklerinin yan\u0131s\u0131ra b\u00f6lgedeki devletlerin asker\u00ee, siyasi, iktisadi durumlar\u0131 hakk\u0131nda rapor haz\u0131rlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u0130gnatiyev, haz\u0131rlam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu raporda Rusya\u2019n\u0131n Hanl\u0131klar aras\u0131ndaki anla\u015fmazl\u0131ktan istifade ederek kolayl\u0131kla T\u00fcrkistan hanl\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 i\u015fgal edebilece\u011fi ve bu anla\u015fmazl\u0131\u011f\u0131 artt\u0131rabilecekleri belirtilmi\u015ftir. \u0130gnatiyev bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131ndan sonra generalli\u011fe terfi ettirilirken Rusya\u2019n\u0131n T\u00fcrkistan i\u00e7lerine do\u011fru ilerleyi\u015fi h\u0131z kazanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Nitekim bundan sonraki s\u00fcre\u00e7te Rusya\u2019n\u0131n b\u00f6lgeyi baz\u0131 noktalarda asker\u00ee g\u00fcce gerek kalmaks\u0131z\u0131n hanl\u0131klar\u0131n kendi aras\u0131ndaki anla\u015fmazl\u0131ktan faydalanarak i\u015fgal ettikleri g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmada \u0130gnatiyev heyetinin haz\u0131rlam\u0131\u015f oldu\u011fu rapor hakk\u0131nda bilgi verilerek bu raporun Rusya\u2019n\u0131n T\u00fcrkistan\u2019daki i\u015fgal stratejisindeki etkileri ele al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Turkestan,Russia,Bukhara,Khiva,Ignatiyev Mission; T\u00fcrkistan,Rusya,Buhara,Hive,\u0130gnatiyev Heyeti Volume: 19, Issue: 2 403-419 ; 1303-0094 ; 2149-5459 ; Gaziantep \u00dcniversitesi Sosyal Bilimler Dergisi ERDO\u011eAN, Aysel"},{"id":"bde4501599d07ed14b878d10ca94c0e36181747a1c8dcd42d36c450150ebd7d7","content":"DETERMINATION OF LEADERSHIP ORIENTATION OF SCHOOL MANAGERS: THE CASE OF SINOP PROVINCE ; OKUL Y\u00d6NET\u0130C\u0130LER\u0130N\u0130N L\u0130DERL\u0130K Y\u00d6NEL\u0130MLER\u0130N\u0130N BEL\u0130RLENMES\u0130: S\u0130NOP \u0130L\u0130 \u00d6RNE\u011e\u0130 Schools are the organizations where education and training services areoffered. Therefore, it can be said that schools have an important position forindividual, state and society. In this context, schools should provide qualityeducation and training services. Leadership and motivation are among thefactors that affect the quality of a school's education and training.Leadership behaviors displayed by the managers in schools affect the motivationof employees positively \/ negatively and affect the success of the school. Inthis study, it is aimed to determine the leadership orientations of schoolmanagers from the case of Sinop. In this study, the relationship between theschool managers' task-oriented leaders or human-oriented leaders and therelationship between these leadership behaviors were investigated. For thispurpose, data were collected from 58 primary and secondary school principals byusing questionnaire technique. As a result of data analysis, it was found thatschool managers were both task oriented and human oriented leaders. Inaddition, it was found that there was a moderately positive positiverelationship between task-oriented leadership behaviors and human-orientedbehaviors of school managers. In general, it is possible to say that the schoolmanagers' leadership orientations are quite high. ; Okullar e\u011fitim ve \u00f6\u011fretim hizmetinin sunuldu\u011fu \u00f6rg\u00fctlerdir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131ylaokullar\u0131n birey, devlet ve toplum i\u00e7in \u00f6nemli konuma sahip olduklar\u0131s\u00f6ylenebilir. Bu ba\u011flamda okullar\u0131n kaliteli e\u011fitim ve \u00f6\u011fretim hizmetindebulunmalar\u0131 gerekmektedir. Bir okulune\u011fitim ve \u00f6\u011fretim hizmet sunumunun kalitesini etkileyen fakt\u00f6rlerin ba\u015f\u0131ndaliderlik ve motivasyon gelmektedir. Okullarda y\u00f6neticilerin sergiledikleriliderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n motivasyonunu olumlu\/olumsuz etkileyerekokulun ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131na etki etmektedir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada Sinop ili \u00f6rne\u011finden hareketleokul y\u00f6neticilerinin liderlik y\u00f6nelimlerinin belirlenmesi ama\u00e7lanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.\u00c7al\u0131\u015fmada okul y\u00f6neticilerinin g\u00f6rev y\u00f6nelimli liderler veya insan y\u00f6nelimliliderler olup olmad\u0131klar\u0131 ve bu liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fki durumuara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu ama\u00e7 do\u011frultusunda 58 ilk\u00f6\u011fretim ve orta\u00f6\u011fretim okulm\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fcnden anket tekni\u011fi kullan\u0131larak veri toplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Verilerin analizisonucunda okul y\u00f6neticilerinin hem g\u00f6rev y\u00f6nelimli hem de insan y\u00f6nelimliliderler olduklar\u0131 tespit edilmi\u015ftir. Ayr\u0131ca okul y\u00f6neticilerinin g\u00f6revy\u00f6nelimli liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 ile insan y\u00f6nelimli davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 aras\u0131nda ortad\u00fczeyde pozitif y\u00f6nl\u00fc anlaml\u0131 bir ili\u015fkinin oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Genel olarak,okul y\u00f6neticilerinin liderlik y\u00f6nelimlerinin olduk\u00e7a y\u00fcksek d\u00fczeyde oldu\u011funus\u00f6ylemek m\u00fcmk\u00fcnd\u00fcr. Leadership Orientation,Task Oriented Leadership,Human Oriented Leadership,School Managers; Liderlik Y\u00f6nelimi,G\u00f6rev Y\u00f6nelimli Liderlik,\u0130nsan Y\u00f6nelimli Liderlik,Okul Y\u00f6neticileri Volume: 24, Issue: 1 231-241 ; 1301-370X ; T\u00fcrkiye Sosyal Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar Dergisi ESMER, Yusuf"},{"id":"821769f7c8358f239b94d19e10742b9669703bc637e888a00896d61aff83e065","content":"Examination of the Transformational Leadership Practices of the Unit Charge Nurses ; Servis Sorumlu Hem\u015firelerinin D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc Liderlik Uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n \u0130ncelenmesi Background: The studies have revealed that the transformational leadership of nurse managers has positive impacts on patient care outcomes, nurses' organizational behavior and institutional outcomes. Therefore, it is important to evaluate the transformational leadership practices of nurse managers in health care institutions. Objective: The aim of this study is to examine the transformational leadership practices of unit charge nurses working in an training and research hospital. Method: The sample of the study, which is descriptive, consists of 218 service nurses, 17 unit charge nurses and five nurse managers working in a Pediatric Diseases and Surgery Training and Research Hospital who volunteered to participate in the research. As data collection tools, \u201cIntroductory Information Form\u201d and \u201cLeadership Practices Inventory (LPI)\u201d were used. LPI consists of two forms namely \u201cSelf Evaluation\u201d and \u201cObserver Evaluation\u201d. In the study, unit charge nurses were evaluated by their subordinates, superiors and peers, using the \u201cObserver Form\u201d. With the \u201cSelf Evaluation Form\u201d, unit charge nurses evaluated themselves. The unit charge nurses was evaluated by a service nurse as a subordinate, by another unit charge nurse as a peer and by the nursing services manager and supervisor nurses working in the nursing services management of the hospital, as superiors. In the analysis of the data, mean, standard deviation, percentage, variance analysis were used. Findings: According to the subordinate, peer and superior evaluations of the unit charge nurses, the means of the total score of LPI was found to be at medium level, while the sub-dimension namely \u2018\u2018Support on the Development of Personnel\u2019\u2019 was higher than the other sub-dimensions. When the means of LPI of the unit charge nurses were examined according to the groups evaluating; it was determined that the scores of the superiors were highest which was followed by the scores of self-evaluation, peers and subordinates respectively. Conclusion: It has been concluded that the transformational leadership practices of the unit charge nurses are at medium level and they need to improve their transformational leadership skills, and it is suggested that on-the-job training programs and continuous training related to leadership should be supported. ; Giri\u015f: Y\u00f6netici hem\u015firelerin d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc liderli\u011finin, hasta bak\u0131m \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131lar\u0131, hem\u015firelerin \u00f6rg\u00fctsel davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 ve kurumsal \u00e7\u0131kt\u0131lar \u00fczerine olumlu etkileri oldu\u011fu yap\u0131lan \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalarda belirlenmi\u015ftir. Bu nedenle sa\u011fl\u0131k bak\u0131m kurumlar\u0131nda y\u00f6netici hem\u015firelerin d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc liderlik uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011ferlendirilmesi \u00f6nemlidir. Ama\u00e7: \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma bir e\u011fitim ara\u015ft\u0131rma hastanesinde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan servis sorumlu hem\u015firelerinin d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc liderlik uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n incelenmesi amac\u0131yla ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. Y\u00f6ntem: Tan\u0131mlay\u0131c\u0131 tipte olan ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n \u00f6rneklemini, bir \u00c7ocuk Hastal\u0131klar\u0131 ve Cerrahisi E\u011fitim ve Ara\u015ft\u0131rma Hastanesi\u2019nde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan, ara\u015ft\u0131rmaya kat\u0131lmaya g\u00f6n\u00fcll\u00fc 218 servis hem\u015firesi, 17 servis sorumlu hem\u015firesi (SSH) ve be\u015f \u00fcst d\u00fczey y\u00f6netici hem\u015fire olu\u015fturmu\u015ftur. Veri toplama arac\u0131 olarak, \u201cTan\u0131t\u0131c\u0131 Bilgi Formu\u201d ve \u201cLiderlik Uygulamalar\u0131 Envanteri\u201d kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Liderlik Uygulamalar\u0131 Envanteri \u201c\u00d6z De\u011ferlendirme\u201d ve \u201cG\u00f6zlemci De\u011ferlendirme\u201d olarak iki formdan olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. \u201cG\u00f6zlemci Formu\u201d ile servis sorumlu hem\u015firesini ast\u0131, akran\u0131 ve \u00fcst\u00fc de\u011ferlendirmi\u015ftir. \u201c\u00d6z De\u011ferlendirme Formu\u201d ile servis sorumlu hem\u015fireleri kendilerini de\u011ferlendirmi\u015flerdir. Servis sorumlu hem\u015firesini, ast\u0131 olarak servis hem\u015fireleri, akran\u0131 olarak bir ba\u015fka servis sorumlu hem\u015firesi, \u00fcst\u00fc olarak hastanenin hem\u015firelik hizmetleri y\u00f6netiminde g\u00f6revli bak\u0131m hizmetleri m\u00fcd\u00fcr\u00fc ve s\u00fcperviz\u00f6r hem\u015fireler de\u011ferlendirmi\u015flerdir. Verilerin analizinde, ortalama, standart sapma, y\u00fczdelik, varyans analizi kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bulgular: Servis sorumlu hem\u015firelerinin, kendi, ast\u0131, akran\u0131 ve \u00fcst\u00fcn\u00fcn de\u011ferlendirmelerine g\u00f6re \u201cLiderlik Uygulamalar\u0131 Envanteri\u201d toplam puan ortalamalar\u0131n\u0131n orta d\u00fczeyde oldu\u011fu, \u201cPersoneli Geli\u015fimi Konusunda Desteklemek\u201d alt boyutunun puan ortalamas\u0131n\u0131n di\u011fer alt boyutlardan daha y\u00fcksek oldu\u011fu saptanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Servis sorumlu hem\u015firelerinin, \u201cLiderlik Uygulamalar\u0131 Envanteri\u201d puan ortalamalar\u0131, de\u011ferlendiren gruplara g\u00f6re incelendi\u011finde; \u00fcstlerin puanlar\u0131n\u0131n en y\u00fcksek oldu\u011fu, daha sonra s\u0131ras\u0131yla \u00f6z de\u011ferlendirmeleri puanlar\u0131n\u0131n, akranlar\u0131n\u0131n ve astlar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011ferlendirme puanlar\u0131n\u0131n geldi\u011fi belirlenmi\u015ftir. Sonu\u00e7: Servis sorumlu hem\u015firelerinin d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc liderlik uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n orta d\u00fczeyde oldu\u011fu, d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc liderlik becerilerini geli\u015ftirmeye ihtiya\u00e7 duyduklar\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olup liderlikle ilgili hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim programlar\u0131 ve s\u00fcrekli e\u011fitimlerin desteklenmesi \u00f6nerilmi\u015ftir. Leadership,Transformational Leadership,Nurse Manager,Unit Charge Nurses; Liderlik,D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmc\u00fc Liderlik,Y\u00f6netici Hem\u015fire,Servis Sorumlu Hem\u015firesi Volume: 13, Issue: 2 100-107 ; 2149-0333 ; Dokuz Eyl\u00fcl \u00dcniversitesi Hem\u015firelik Fak\u00fcltesi Elektronik Dergisi ARSLAN, Emel; VATAN, Fahriye"},{"id":"2c82119d078aee958fc3a24454e85744eff6a7aa3518fb719346de20d9cdd59c","content":"Lojistik Sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde Sistem Yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve S\u00fcre\u00e7 Kalitesinin Performansa Etkisi ; The Effect of System Approach and Process Quality on Performance In The Logistics Sector Di\u011fersekt\u00f6rlerde oldu\u011fu gibi lojistik sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde de i\u015fletmelerin ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 olabilmesii\u00e7in \u00fcr\u00fcnlerinin kaliteli olmas\u0131 gerekir. Bu kapsamda lojistik sekt\u00f6r\u00fcndefaaliyet g\u00f6steren i\u015fletmelerde de Toplam Kalite Y\u00f6netimi (TKY) ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 bir\u015fekilde uygulanabilir. Nitekim, literat\u00fcrde TKY\u2019ni uygulayan i\u015fletmelerin y\u00fcksekperformans sergiledi\u011fi ve rekabet \u00fcst\u00fcnl\u00fc\u011f\u00fc sa\u011flad\u0131\u011f\u0131na dair \u00e7ok say\u0131da \u00f6rnekbulunmaktad\u0131r. TKY\u2019nin y\u00f6netim liderli\u011fi, s\u00fcrekli iyile\u015ftirme, m\u00fc\u015fteri vei\u015fg\u00f6ren memnuniyeti ile sistem yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve s\u00fcre\u00e7 kalitesi olmak \u00fczere d\u00f6rtboyutu bulunmaktad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131; TKY\u2019nin alt boyutlar\u0131ndan biri olansistem yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve s\u00fcre\u00e7 kalitesinin i\u015fletme performans\u0131n\u0131 ne \u015fekilde etkiledi\u011fini ve aralar\u0131nda anlaml\u0131 bir ili\u015fki olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 tespitetmektir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma, Mersin ilinde faaliyet g\u00f6steren lojistik firmalar\u0131ndager\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. Veriler bu firmalar\u0131n farkl\u0131 pozisyonlar\u0131nda \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan, 166ki\u015fiden, basit tesad\u00fcfi \u00f6rneklem y\u00f6ntemi ile toplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmada, K\u00fc\u00e7\u00fck vearkada\u015flar\u0131 (2015)\u2019n\u0131n literat\u00fcr ara\u015ft\u0131rmas\u0131 neticesinde olu\u015fturdu\u011fu TKY \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fiile \u0130\u015fletme Performans\u0131 \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fi kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmada; \u00f6ncelikle \u00f6rneklemve \u00f6l\u00e7ekler hakk\u0131nda bilgi verilmi\u015f, de\u011fi\u015fkenler aras\u0131 korelasyon tespitedilmi\u015f, m\u00fcteakiben regresyon analizi ile sistem yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve s\u00fcre\u00e7 kalitesiile i\u015fletme performans\u0131 aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fki ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Verilerin analizindeSPSS ve AMOS program\u0131 kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan analizler neticesinde; sistemyakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve s\u00fcre\u00e7 kalitesinin, operasyonel ve yenilik performans\u0131n\u0131pozitif ve anlaml\u0131 y\u00f6nde etkiledi\u011fi tespit edilmi\u015ftir. ; In order to besuccessful in the logistics sector as in other sectors, the products must be ofhigh quality. In this context, Total Quality Management (TQM) can be appliedsuccessfully in the companies operating in logistics sector. As a matter offact, there are many examples in the literature that companies applying TQMperform well and provide competitive advantage. TQM has four dimensions:management leadership, continuous improvement, customer-employee satisfactionand system approach and process quality. The aim of this study is to determinehow system approach and process quality, which is one of the sub-dimensions ofTQM, affect business performance and whether there is a significantrelationship between them. The research was conducted in logistics companiesoperating in Mersin. The data were collected from 166 people working indifferent positions of these firms by convenience sampling. In this presentpaper, firstly information about samples and scales was given, correlationbetween variables was determined, and then regression analysis was used toinvestigate the relationship between system approach and process quality andbusiness performance. SPSS and AMOS program were used for data analysis. As aresult of the analyzes, it was determined that system approach and processquality have positive and significant effects on operational and innovationperformance. Lojistik,Toplam Kalite Y\u00f6netimi (TKY),Sistem Yakla\u015f\u0131m\u0131 ve S\u00fcre\u00e7 Kalitesi,Performans; Logistics,Total Quality Management,System approach,Process Quality,Performance Volume: 13, Issue: 1 52-60 ; 2564-6931 ; \u00d6mer Halisdemir \u00dcniversitesi \u0130ktisadi ve \u0130dari Bilimler Fak\u00fcltesi Dergisi T\u00dcRK, Ay\u015fe; BEKMEZC\u0130, Mustafa"},{"id":"9b277fc9aea66da510efee7f54f6647df5f2fd1ce38897f6e1acd5aa076abec6","content":"Olumlu ve Olumsuz Mesaj Stratejileri Ba\u011flam\u0131nda Siyasi Liderin Se\u00e7men Alg\u0131s\u0131 \u00dczerine Etkisi: 31 Mart 2019 Mahalli \u0130dareler Se\u00e7imi \u00d6rne\u011fi ; The Effect of Political Leader pn Voter Perception in the Context of Positive and Negative Message Strategies: The Case of 31 March 2019 Local Elections Liderlik en genel tan\u0131m\u0131yla belirli bir ama\u00e7 i\u00e7in bir grup insan\u0131 bir araya getirme, etkileme,y\u00f6nlendirme ve harekete ge\u00e7irme kabiliyetidir. Siyasi arenada da liderlik en \u00f6nemli fakt\u00f6rlerdenbiridir. \u00dclkemiz siyasi tarihinin her a\u015famas\u0131nda siyasi liderlerin olumlu ya da olumsuz etkilerioldu\u011funu s\u00f6ylemek yanl\u0131\u015f olmayacakt\u0131r. Bilhassa se\u00e7im s\u00fcre\u00e7lerinde halk\u0131n kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131na \u00e7\u0131kan veonlar\u0131 ikna edip desteklerini almaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015fan siyasi liderlerin m\u00fccadeleleri se\u00e7im sonu\u00e7lar\u0131nado\u011frudan etki etmi\u015ftir. Se\u00e7im s\u00fcrecinde kullan\u0131lan stratejiler de sava\u015f meydanlar\u0131ndauygulananlar\u0131 aratmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Muktedir olmak isteyen siyasi akt\u00f6rler bu ba\u011flamda birbirlerinesald\u0131rmaktan veya negatif s\u00f6ylemlerde bulunmaktan ka\u00e7\u0131nmam\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. Bunun i\u00e7in her t\u00fcrl\u00fcsiyasal ileti\u015fim faaliyeti kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu faaliyetlerde olumlu ve olumsuz mesaj stratejileride uygulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Her toplum tarz\u0131 ne olursa olsun bir y\u00f6netim bi\u00e7imine sahiptir. Baz\u0131 \u00fclkelerg\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc se\u00e7im sistemlerine sahipken baz\u0131lar\u0131nda saltanatlar, kabilecilik ya da diktat\u00f6rl\u00fck h\u00fck\u00fcms\u00fcrmektedir. Demokratik sistemin yerle\u015fti\u011fi toplumlarda iktidar, temsil yoluyla siyasal akt\u00f6rleredevredilir. Bunun i\u00e7in se\u00e7imler yap\u0131l\u0131r ve \u00e7o\u011funlu\u011fun deste\u011fini arkas\u0131na alan siyasi partilerbelirli s\u00fcreler i\u00e7in g\u00f6reve gelirler. Bu s\u00fcre\u00e7, bir\u00e7ok fakt\u00f6r\u00fcn bir araya gelmesiyle i\u015fleyen birmekanizmad\u0131r. Bu fakt\u00f6rler i\u00e7erisinde siyasal liderli\u011fin rol\u00fc olduk\u00e7a \u00f6nemli bir yer tutmaktad\u0131r.\u00d6zellikle T\u00fcrkiye gibi siyasal kat\u0131l\u0131m oran\u0131n y\u00fcksek oldu\u011fu \u00fclkelerde siyasal liderler, \u00e7o\u011funluklapartileriyle \u00f6zde\u015fle\u015ftirilmekte hatta kimi durumlarda partilerinin bile \u00f6n\u00fcnde yer almaktad\u0131r.Bu kapsamda Ak Parti ve CHP\u2019nin 31 Mart 2019 Mahalli \u0130dareler Se\u00e7imine y\u00f6nelik yay\u0131nlad\u0131klar\u0131se\u00e7im beyannamelerinden elde edilen olumlu ve olumsuz mesajlar nitel i\u00e7erik analizi y\u00f6ntemiyleincelenmi\u015f ve \u00f6l\u00e7ek geli\u015ftirilerek kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lara y\u00f6neltilmi\u015ftir. Aksaray \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nin \u00e7e\u015fitlib\u00f6l\u00fcmlerinde \u00f6\u011frenim g\u00f6ren 430 \u00f6\u011frenciyle yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmada yap\u0131lan analizler neticesindesiyasi liderin kulland\u0131\u011f\u0131 mesaj stratejilerinin kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar \u00fczerinde etkili oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. ; Leadership, in its most general definition, is the ability to bring together, influence, manipulateand mobilize a group of people for a particular purpose. Leadership is one of the most importantfactors in the political arena. It will not be wrong to say that political leaders have positive ornegative effects at every stage of our country\u2019s political history. Especially in the electoral process,the struggles of political leaders who oppose the people and try to persuade them and get theirsupport had a direct impact on election results. The strategies used in the election processare similar to those applied in battlefields. Political actors wishing to be able to do so did notavoid attacking each other or making negative statements. All kinds of political communicationactivities have been used for this purpose. Positive and negative message strategies were alsoimplemented in these activities. Every society has a form of government, whatever its style.Some countries have strong electoral systems, while others are dominated by reigns, tribalismor dictatorship. In societies where the democratic system settles, power is transferred to politicalactors through representation. For this purpose, elections are held and political parties, whichhave the support of the majority, come to work for certain periods. This process is a mechanismthat works by combining many factors. The role of political leadership is very important amongthese factors. Political leaders in countries with high political participation are often identifiedwith their parties and sometimes even in front of them. In this context, the positive and negativemessages obtained from the election declarations issued by Ak Parti and CHP for the March 31,2019 Local Administrations Election were examined by qualitative content analysis method andthe scale was developed and directed to the participants. As a result of the research conductedwith 430 students studying at various departments of Aksaray University, it is understood thatthe message strategies used by the political leader were effective on the participants. Liderlik,Se\u00e7im Kampanyalar\u0131,Mesaj Stratejileri; Leadership,Election Campaigns,Message Strategies Volume: 7, Issue: 1 557-578 ; 1308-3198 ; 2667-5811 ; Erciyes \u0130leti\u015fim Dergisi CAN, Efe Numan; G\u00dcLL\u00dcPUNAR, Hasan"},{"id":"4dc30ed6b8737424883111ed97c034c5dd80bb970c29d7d5392756ef4248e591","content":"OKUL Y\u00d6NET\u0130C\u0130LER\u0130N\u0130N OTANT\u0130K L\u0130DERL\u0130K DAVRANI\u015eLARI \u0130LE \u00d6\u011eRETMENLER\u0130N \u00d6RG\u00dcTSEL VATANDA\u015eLIK DAVRANI\u015eLARI VE \u00d6RG\u00dcTSEL BA\u011eLILIK D\u00dcZEYLER\u0130 ARASINDAK\u0130 \u0130L\u0130\u015eK\u0130 Buara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n amac\u0131, okul y\u00f6neticilerinin otantik liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 ile\u00f6\u011fretmenlerin \u00f6rg\u00fctsel vatanda\u015fl\u0131k davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131 ve \u00f6rg\u00fctsel ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131k d\u00fczeyleriaras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkinin belirlenmesidir. Y\u00f6ntem olarak ili\u015fkisel tarama modelininkullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bu ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n evrenini 2016-2017 e\u011fitim-\u00f6\u011fretim y\u0131l\u0131nda Sivas ilmerkezindeki resmi anaokulu, ilkokul, ortaokul ve liselerde g\u00f6rev yapan toplam3814 \u00f6\u011fretmen olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n \u00f6rneklemini ise orant\u0131l\u0131 tabakal\u0131\u00f6rnekleme y\u00f6ntemi ile belirlenen 760 \u00f6\u011fretmen olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmada veritoplama arac\u0131 olarak ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan geli\u015ftirilen ki\u015fisel bilgi formununyan\u0131 s\u0131ra \u201cOtantik Liderlik \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fi\u201d, \u201c\u00d6rg\u00fctsel Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Davran\u0131\u015f\u0131 \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fi\u201d ve\u201c\u00d6\u011fretmenler \u0130\u00e7in \u00d6rg\u00fctsel Ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131k \u00d6l\u00e7e\u011fi\u201d kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rmasonu\u00e7lar\u0131na g\u00f6re okul y\u00f6neticileri s\u0131k s\u0131k otantik liderlik davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131sergilemektedir. \u00d6\u011fretmenlerin \u00f6rg\u00fctsel vatanda\u015fl\u0131k davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131sergilemelerine y\u00f6nelik alg\u0131lar\u0131 ise tamamen kat\u0131l\u0131yorum d\u00fczeyindedir.\u00d6\u011fretmenlerin ya\u015flar\u0131 artt\u0131k\u00e7a sergiledikleri \u00f6rg\u00fctsel vatanda\u015fl\u0131k davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131da d\u00fczenli olarak artmaktad\u0131r.The aim of thisstudy is to determine the relationship between school administrators\u2019organizational leadership behaviors, organizational citizenship behaviors andtheir organizational commitment levels. 3814 teachers working in the officialkindergarten, primary, secondary and high schools in the city center of Sivasin the academic year of 2016-2017 constitute the universe of this research, inwhich the relational screening model was used. The sample of the study consistsof 760 teachers determined by the proportional stratified sampling method. Inaddition to the personal information form developed by the researcher, the\u201cAuthentic Leadership Scale\u201d, \u201cOrganizational Citizenship Behavior Scale\u201d and\u201cTeachers' Organizational Commitment Scale\u201d were used as data collection tools. According to the researchresults, school administrators often exhibit authentic leadership behaviors.Teachers' perceptions of exhibiting organizational citizenship behaviors are inthe level of \u201cI completely agree\u201d. As the age of teachers increases, theirorganizational citizenship behaviors also increase regularly. Okul Y\u00f6neticisi,Otantik Liderlik,\u00d6rg\u00fctsel Ba\u011fl\u0131l\u0131k,\u00d6rg\u00fctsel Vatanda\u015fl\u0131k Davran\u0131\u015f\u0131 Issue: 54 382-414 ; 1302-8944 ; Mehmet Akif Ersoy \u00dcniversitesi E\u011fitim Fak\u00fcltesi Dergisi G\u00d6KYER, Necmi; KO\u00c7AK, Osman"},{"id":"6c6efa3bcfaae67f471ecdb22232d8662d13b83b25557b0968fc93ade22cd5b9","content":"Ulus \u00d6tesi \u0130tibar Y\u00f6netimi: T\u00fcrk \u0130nternet Habercili\u011finde Kanada Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 ; International Reputation Management: Canadian Prime Minister in Turkish Internet Journalism Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131 itibar y\u00f6netimi kavram\u0131n\u0131n siyasal ileti\u015fimdeki yans\u0131malar\u0131 ile medya pratikleri aras\u0131ndaki etkile\u015fimi ortaya koymakt\u0131r. \u0130lk b\u00f6l\u00fcmde siyasal ileti\u015fimde itibar y\u00f6netimine ili\u015fkin genel bir \u00e7er\u00e7eve \u00e7izilirken devam\u0131nda bu alandaki g\u00fcncel e\u011filimlerden yeni siyaset kavram\u0131na de\u011finilerek, kavram\u0131n itibar ve imaj \u00fcretme ile y\u00f6netme konular\u0131nda medya uygulamalar\u0131nda yaratt\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm de\u011ferlendirilmektedir. \u0130kinci b\u00f6l\u00fcmde yeni siyaset anlay\u0131\u015f\u0131n\u0131n itibar y\u00f6netimine sundu\u011fu a\u00e7\u0131l\u0131mlar \u00fczerine temellendirilen uygulama k\u0131sm\u0131 yer almaktad\u0131r. Bu b\u00f6l\u00fcmde yeni siyaset pratikleri Kanada Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Justin Trudeau'nun \u00fclkesinden servis edilen haberlerinin uluslararas\u0131 haber ajanslar\u0131 dolay\u0131m\u0131yla T\u00fcrk medyas\u0131ndaki sunumu analiz edilmektedir. Analiz Kanada Ba\u015fbakan\u0131 Justin Trudeau'nun T\u00fcrk medyas\u0131nda itibar y\u00f6netiminin sunumu ile kimlik konumland\u0131rmas\u0131ndaki yeni siyaset e\u011filimini ortaya koymak i\u00e7in bir y\u0131ll\u0131k s\u00fcre\u00e7te konu oldu\u011fu t\u00fcm haberlerin i\u00e7erik analizi ile incelenerek de\u011ferlendirilmesini kapsamaktad\u0131r. Analiz bulgular\u0131 neticesinde mevcut Kanada h\u00fck\u00fcmetinin d\u0131\u015f politikada lider kimli\u011fi \u00fczerinden itibar y\u00f6netimi s\u00fcrecini y\u00fcr\u00fctt\u00fc\u011f\u00fc, bu s\u00fcrecin yeni siyaset unsurlar\u0131n\u0131 ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131, Ba\u015fbakan Trudeau'nun sempatik ve sorun \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcc\u00fc bir imaj ile medyada konumland\u0131r\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 sonucuna var\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. ; The aim of this study is to reveal the reflections of transformations in the field of reputation management and media practices. In the first section, in which are the theoritical framework, the history of political communication, political marketing, election campaigns and their new aims in the politics are explicated. The second part of the study is the research part which is based on the opportunities offered by the new politics to political communication is included. In this section, the practices evolving from traditional politics to new politics are analyzed in the Turkish media through the presentation of the acts served by Justin Trudeau who is the Prime Minister of Canada, from his country through international news agencies. The analysis includes how the Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is presented in the Turkish media with an identity positioning and whether or not there are new politics tendencies in this position. As a result, it has been revealed that the Canadian government has made an identity positioning through the leadership identity in foreign policy and this situation carries new politics elements. siyasal ileti\u015fim,yeni siyaset,lider imaj\u0131,Justin Trudeau; Reputation management,Leader image,Justin Trudeau Volume: 18, Issue: 1 129-146 ; 1304-4796 ; 2146-2844 ; Manisa Celal Bayar \u00dcniversitesi Sosyal Bilimler Dergisi MERMER \u00dcZ\u00dcML\u00dc, Aytu\u011f"},{"id":"a9f7e825b5b7a55fe032a019859585f0f1dbf16c7c5e28757563ed99c08bab59","content":"\u0130\u015fletme \u00dcst D\u00fczey Y\u00f6neticilerinin Stratejik Liderlik Alg\u0131lar\u0131n\u0131n De\u011ferlendirilmesi \u00dczerine Nitel Bir \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma ; A Qualitative Study on Assessment of Strategic Leadership Perception of Senior Executives of Enterprises Bu ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n ana amac\u0131, \u0130SO 500\u2019e giren i\u015fletme \u00fcst d\u00fczey y\u00f6neticilerinin bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131yla stratejik liderlik kavram\u0131n\u0131 incelemektir. Bu kapsamda nitel ara\u015ft\u0131rma y\u00f6ntemlerinden en \u00e7ok kullan\u0131lan teknik olan g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fme tekni\u011fi ile veriler elde edilmi\u015ftir. 7 genel m\u00fcd\u00fcr, 4 genel m\u00fcd\u00fcr yard\u0131mc\u0131s\u0131, 1 y\u00f6netim kurulu ba\u015fkan\u0131 ve 2 y\u00f6netim kurulu \u00fcyesi olmak \u00fczere toplam 14 \u00fcst d\u00fczey y\u00f6neticiyle yap\u0131lan g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmelerden elde edilen veriler bilgisayar ortam\u0131na aktar\u0131ld\u0131ktan sonra veriler betimsel analize ve i\u00e7erik analizine tabi tutulmu\u015ftur. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada stratejik liderlik \u00f6zellikleri d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmsel, y\u00f6netsel, etik ve politik liderlik temalar\u0131 alt\u0131nda de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir. Bu stratejik liderlik \u00f6zelliklerinin bir arada kullan\u0131lmas\u0131n\u0131n, belirsizli\u011fin h\u00e2kim oldu\u011fu ko\u015fullarda \u00fcst d\u00fczey y\u00f6neticilere ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 olma olana\u011f\u0131 sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131 sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. ; The primary aim of this research is to examine the concept of strategic leadership from the perspective of senior executives from the ISO 500. In this context, data were obtained using the interview technique, which is the most widely used qualitative research method. The data obtained from the interviews with a total of 14 senior executives, including 7 general managers, 4 assistant general managers, 1 chairman and 2 members of the board of directors, were uploaded and the data were subjected to descriptive and content computer analysis. In this study, strategic leadership characteristics were evaluated under the themes of transformational, managerial, ethical and political leadership. It is concluded that the use of these strategic leadership features together will enable senior executives to succeed under uncertain conditions. a:4:{i:0;s:8:"Strateji";i:1;s:18:"Stratejik Liderlik";i:2;s:8:"\u0130SO 500";i:3;s:17:"Nitel Ara\u015ft\u0131rma";}; a:4:{i:0;s:8:"Strategy";i:1;s:20:"Strategic Leadership";i:2;s:7:"ISO 500";i:3;s:20:"Qualitative Research";} Issue: 88 169-200 ; 2619-9254 ; Istanbul Management Journal D\u00dcZG\u00dcN, Ayseg\u00fcl"},{"id":"97eaf5ce555f7272090f1f9b6d5dd93a3af70e442ff91b78924572a44f475a71","content":"D\u00d6N\u00dc\u015e\u00dcMSEL VE ETK\u0130LE\u015e\u0130MSEL L\u0130DERL\u0130\u011e\u0130N \u00d6RG\u00dcTSEL SESS\u0130ZL\u0130\u011eE ETK\u0130S\u0130 ; THE EFFECT OF TRANSFORMATIONAL AND TRANSACTIONAL LEADERSHIP ON ORGAN\u0130ZAT\u0130ONAL SILENCE \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar fikir ve \u00f6nerilerini \u00f6zg\u00fcr bir \u015fekilde s\u00f6yleyebildiklerinde ve seslerini duyurabildiklerinde daha etkili g\u00f6rev yapmaktad\u0131rlar. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n sessizli\u011fi \u00f6rg\u00fctsel de\u011fi\u015fimin \u00f6n\u00fcnde engel olarak g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 bir lider taraf\u0131ndan daha yarat\u0131c\u0131, inovatif ve de\u011fi\u015fime kar\u015f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131k olabilmektedir. D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmsel liderlik ve etkile\u015fimsel liderlik tarzlar\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6rg\u00fctsel sessizlik \u00fczerinde etkisinin olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n incelenmesi ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n temel amac\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada anket y\u00f6ntemi kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olup veriler IBM SPSS 23.0 istatistik program\u0131 ile analiz edilmi\u015ftir. Fakt\u00f6r analizi sonucunda \u00e7\u0131kan d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmsel ve etkile\u015fimsel liderli\u011fin kabullenici ve korunmac\u0131 sessizli\u011fe etkisinde kontrol de\u011fi\u015fkeni olarak ya\u015f kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Analiz sonucunda etkile\u015fimsel liderli\u011fin korunmac\u0131 sessizli\u011fi y\u00fcksek oranda ve olumlu \u015fekilde etkiledi\u011fi g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Kabullenici sessizli\u011fi d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmsel liderlik ve ya\u015f fakt\u00f6rlerinin olumsuz, etkile\u015fimsel liderli\u011fin ise olumlu etkiledi\u011fi bulunmu\u015ftur. D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmsel liderli\u011fin oldu\u011fu ortamlarda kabullenici sessizlik ve korunmac\u0131 sessizli\u011fin azald\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclm\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcr. Etkile\u015fimsel liderlik uygulamalar\u0131yla \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n kabullenici ve korunma ama\u00e7l\u0131 sessizli\u011fi artmaktad\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n sonunda yeni \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalara ve y\u00f6neticilere y\u00f6nelik olarak \u00f6nerilerde bulunulmu\u015ftur. ; When employees speak their ideas and make suggestions freely and make their voices heard, they may work more effectively. The silence of the employees is seen as an obstacle in terms of organizational development and change. The employees are more creative, innovative and openness to change by a successful leader. The main aim of this study is to examine whether there are effects of transformational leadership and transactional leadership styles on organizational silence. In this study, survey method was used and data were analyzed with IBM SPSS 23.0 statistical program. Age used as control variables in the effect of transformational and interactive leadership resulting from factor analysis on acquiescent and defensive silence. As a result, it was observed that transactional leadership had a positive effect on the defensive silence. It has been found that transformational leadership and age have negative and transactional leadership has positive effects on acquiescent silence. It is seen that the employees can put their ideas against the change in the environments where transformational leadership exists. It has been observed that employees acquiescent and defensive silence are increased with their transactional leadership practices. As a result of the study, suggestions were made for the managers and new researches. D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmsel liderlik,Kabullenici Sessizlik,Etkile\u015fimsel Liderlik,\u00d6rg\u00fctsel Sessizlik,Korunmac\u0131 Sessizlik; Transformational Leadership,Transactional Leadership,Organizational Silence,Acquiescent Silence,Defensive Silence Volume: 7, Issue: 1 199-228 ; 2148-2462 ; 2458-9217 ; TESAM Akademi AKIN, \u00d6zden"},{"id":"85988f416f61c1a58c5a8c3b5f1b0c0233f2498d675b296eff7f5d8c1e1082ae","content":"COMMUNICATION SKILLS FOR MENTORS IN SOCIAL BUSINESS The word mentor comes from \u201cMentor\u201d, the old man to whom Odysseus entrusted his house and son Telemachus. Accordingly, mentoring can be assumed as the guidance whereby one person shares their experience and expertise to support other people to progress in their own lives and careers.Mentoring encompasses supportive relationships finalized to job performance, leadership practices, a career as well as teaching learning-processes. This paper analyzes the function of mentors in social business and the communication skills they need in using digital media. This paper aims to give an overview of the various aspects and issues related to social mentoring, focusing on the use of digital communication technologies to assist mentors in providing guidance, knowledge, and support. It reports and discusses the preliminary results of the desk research carried out by the authors within the EU project DICCMEM. social mentoring; social mentors; digital communication skills; digital social mentoring; mentee SOCIETY. INTEGRATION. EDUCATION. Proceedings of the International Scientific Conference; Vol 5 (2020): SOCIETY.INTEGRATION.EDUCATION. Proceedings of the International Scientific Conference. May 22nd-23rd, 2020, Volume V, LIFELONG LEARNING, INNOVATION IN LANGUAGE EDUCATION, ART AND DESIGN; 213-220 ; 2256-0629 ; 1691-5887 Marzano, Gilberto; Zorzi, Simone"},{"id":"644b9bfcb2642ac5b6dbd34f6dfb9b90f1d7db4c330990128d7e1fcff158206f","content":"JAPAN AND US: COMPARATIVE ANALYSIS OF NEW APPROACHES TO BILATERAL RELATIONS ; \u042f\u041f\u041e\u041d\u0418\u042f \u0418 \u0421\u0428\u0410: \u0421\u0420\u0410\u0412\u041d\u0418\u0422\u0415\u041b\u042c\u041d\u042b\u0419 \u0410\u041d\u0410\u041b\u0418\u0417 \u041d\u041e\u0412\u042b\u0425 \u041f\u041e\u0414\u0425\u041e\u0414\u041e\u0412 \u041a \u0414\u0412\u0423\u0421\u0422\u041e\u0420\u041e\u041d\u041d\u0418\u041c \u041e\u0422\u041d\u041e\u0428\u0415\u041d\u0418\u042f\u041c Japan \u2013 U.S. relations, which are of great importance for the both countries as well as for international relations in North-East Asia and the Indo-Pacifi c, have experienced signifi cant changes in recent years. While continuing to maintain close military-political alliance with the United States and recognize unconditionally its leadership regarding the choice of strategic course and priorities, Japan is increasingly promoting its own regional policy agenda and its vision of national interests. The main task of its government, headed by Shinzo Abe, is a kind of \u00abrebranding\u00bb Japan in political terms as a \u00abnormal\u00bb country void of negative historical heritage with the ability to employ a full set of foreign policy tools and promote its interests on a regional scale. The said task brings about new accents in Japan\u2019s relations with the USA in the sphere of security, in solving regional political problems and regulating mutual trade and investment. At the same time, bilateral relations are viewed by Japan as a complex set where some elements can be used as a tool or traded as parts of a package deal to secure a comprehensive solution.The United States, for its part, is focusing on maintaining its role as the undisputed leader, trying to neutralize Japan\u2019s attempts to break the framework of the established hierarchical order and change the logic of bilateral relations to that of trading concessions and optimizing complex network balance.Since the change of presidential administration in the US in 2017 there has been a marked decay of long-established consensus on the desirability of further liberalization of international trade and investment through multilateral agreements and frameworks. Like other countries, Japan faced a persistent drive by Trump administration to withdraw from them in favor of bilateral agreements on managed and balanced trade. Japan\u2019s government had to give in to the US pressure and begin negotiations on a bilateral trade agreement designed to reduce imbalance of trade fl ows between the two countries through policy steps to be taken mainly by the Japanese side. ; \u041e\u0442\u043d\u043e\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f \u043c\u0435\u0436\u0434\u0443 \u042f\u043f\u043e\u043d\u0438\u0435\u0439 \u0438 Klyueva A.; \u0412. \u0428\u0432\u044b\u0434\u043a\u043e \u0413.; \u0415. \u041a\u043b\u044e\u0435\u0432\u0430 \u0410."},{"id":"5210c040adb4663f7d63b6116453cb515284d7e5fea09e53eb8c17c68f5489de","content":"THE PROBLEM OF TERRORISM AND APPROACHES TO AFGHANISTAN IN THE RUSSIA-INDIA-CHINA TRIANGLE ; \u041f\u0420\u041e\u0411\u041b\u0415\u041c\u042b \u0422\u0415\u0420\u0420\u041e\u0420\u0418\u0417\u041c\u0410 \u0418 \u041f\u041e\u0414\u0425\u041e\u0414\u042b \u041a \u0410\u0424\u0413\u0410\u041d\u0418\u0421\u0422\u0410\u041d\u0423 \u0412 \u0422\u0420\u0415\u0423\u0413\u041e\u041b\u042c\u041d\u0418\u041a\u0415 \u0420\u041e\u0421\u0421\u0418\u042f-\u0418\u041d\u0414\u0418\u042f-\u041a\u0418\u0422\u0410\u0419 The article deals with the problems of joint actions of Russia, India, and China to mitigate the terrorist threat from Islamist terrorists in the Central part of Eurasia. The author comes to the conclusion that, from an objective point of view, the three giants have completely uniform approaches to terrorism, separatism and extremism. Moreover, along with the refusal to accept the monopolar structure of the world system, it is the fight against such radicalism that is the main parameter contributing to the real existence of the triangle. However, the concrete actions of the three powers do not indicate any established cooperation. The analysis shows that the main reason is the policy of China, which is extremely wary of India and prefers Russia to stand alone against terrorist activity in the region. Joint public statements remain pure declarations, not supported by real steps. In the fight against Islamist terrorism in the PRC itself, Beijing does not take action to limit external support for Uighur radicals (and doesn't, for example, exert any pressure on Islamabad, dependent on China, to limit the activities of Pakistan's InterServices Intelligence, which has close contacts with the main Islamist organizations of South and South-East Asia, Central Asia, Afghanistan, and China itself), preferring independent actions.Russia has gone to fairly broad cooperation with different countries, as well as with regional and global organizations in the fight against international terrorism. Particular importance is attached to the development of contacts on this issue with key strategic partners (China, India, Kazakhstan) and the work of organizations such as the Shanghai Cooperation Organization and the Collective Security Treaty Organization. Anti-terrorist operations are constantly carried out, however, outside the Russian Federation they are carried out only in very rare cases. On the formal side, Russia is taking certain steps to limit the spread of radical Islamic ideas in the region. The counter terrorism centers and anti-terrorism programs created within the framework of the SCO and the CSTO have been widely advertised. However, there is essentially no practical impact from them, and many structures simply duplicate each other (including in terms of lack of efficiency).Therefore, it is imperative to establish a significant rapprochement between the three giants on the issue of countering the terrorist threat, although neither the scope nor the framework of interaction has been clearly defined yet. ; \u0412 Lunev I.; \u0421. \u041b\u0443\u043d\u0435\u0432 \u0418."},{"id":"afdf6a126cbf6c4a820e7fef1e5b61814eb74fa1b4f19d4df5a333c66c5ee88c","content":"School Leaders in Kazakhstan: Perspectives, Roles and Challenges School leadership is back to fashion and became the major concern for many pieces of research. Expectations from schools and school leaders are changing along with time and society demands. Countries care about the future and its competitive capacity in a global arena, hence, one of the strategic directions is to invest in education. Moreover, current tendencies require reconsidering the activities of educational leaders at all levels. This paper aims at exploring the current situation of school leadership and school leaders in general and research the perspectives, roles, and challenges they face nowadays. The paper also considers international perspectives on school leadership as well as the context of Kazakhstan. The study discusses the variety of leadership roles and challenges the school leaders confront aiming at school development. The findings include the overview of school management systems and existing practices of school development in Kazakhstan. Nevertheless, there is a number of challenges in understanding the concept of school leader and the roles due to the lack of consistent research on effective practices. The paper reveals a number of inconsistencies in terms of the lack of differentiation between the roles, characteristics, and responsibilities of school leaders. The research provides recommendations on conducting larger-scale research to enable the complete picture of school leadership in Kazakhstan.  Journal of Education in Black Sea Region; Vol 5 No 2 (2020): Journal of Education in Black Sea Region; 51-61 ; 2449-2426 ; 2346-8246 ; 10.31578\/jebs.v5i2 Nurmukhanova, Dana"},{"id":"997125e653d006807284212bd8612f59a3f9f66def3ddede469e9649d3cedcfa","content":"Blok Zinciri Teknolojisi ; Blockchain Technology G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde sosyal medya, bankac\u0131l\u0131k uygulamalar\u0131 ve geli\u015fmekte olan di\u011fer teknolojiler cihazlar\u0131n b\u00fcy\u00fck miktarda veri \u00fcretmesine neden olmaktad\u0131r. Bu verilerin kontrol, y\u00f6netim, bak\u0131m s\u00fcre\u00e7leri ve g\u00fcvenli bir \u015fekilde payla\u015f\u0131lmas\u0131 g\u00fcn ge\u00e7tik\u00e7e daha da \u00f6nem kazanmaktad\u0131r. Finans sekt\u00f6r\u00fcn\u00fcn liderli\u011finde veri depolama ve veri y\u00f6netim aray\u0131\u015flar\u0131na her ge\u00e7en g\u00fcn yeni bir bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131 veya teknoloji eklenmektedir. Bunun son ve en pop\u00fcler \u00f6rneklerinden biri Blok zinciri (Blockchain) teknolojisidir. Kripto para birimi Bitcoin\u2019le en pop\u00fcler zaman\u0131na ula\u015fan Blok zinciri teknolojisinin sadece bir sanal para birimi teknolojisi olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131kt\u0131r. Bu ara\u015ft\u0131rma Blok zinciri teknolojisini derinlemesine ele almakta, \u00e7e\u015fitleri, mimarisi, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma prensibi, kullan\u0131m alanlar\u0131n\u0131 inceleyerek bu teknolojiyi \u00e7e\u015fitli kriterler a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan geleneksel veritaban\u0131 y\u00f6netim sistemleri ile kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131rmaktad\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 merkezi yap\u0131y\u0131 sonland\u0131ran ve g\u00fcvenli\u011fi \u00f6n planda tutan bu teknolojiye h\u0131zl\u0131 bir \u015fekilde adapte olunmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fini ortaya koymaktad\u0131r. ; Social media, banking applications, and other emerging technologies cause devices to produce large amounts of data. Moreover, the control, management, maintenance and security of data becomes vital. A new perspective\/technology is being added to the search for data storage and data management under the leadership of the finance sector. In this sense, Blockchain technology is often mentioned. It is clear that Blockchain technology, which reaches its most popular time with Bitcoin, is not just a virtual currency technology. This research examines the Blockchain technology in depth, examines its types, architecture, working principle, usage areas and compares this technology with traditional database management systems for various variables. The results of the research show that the technology should be adapted quickly to the central structure and to keep the security in the forefront. \u0420\u043e\u0437\u0433\u043b\u044f\u0434\u0430\u0454\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u0432\u043d\u0435\u0441\u043e\u043a \u043e\u043a\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0438\u0445 \u0434\u0456\u044f\u0447\u0456\u0432, \u043f\u043e\u0432\u2019\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0445 \u0437 \u0423\u043a\u0440\u0430\u0457\u043d\u043e\u044e, \u0443 \u0441\u0432\u0456\u0442\u043e\u0432\u043e\u043c\u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0435\u043a\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0437\u0430\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0436\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0430\u0432\u0456\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457. ; The article deals with the processes of formation of organizational structures,which later became the basis of the military aviation command and control organization as a component of the armed forces of the leading countries of the world in the late 19th \u2014 early 20th centuries before the World War I. The author also reveals the processes that took place in the armed forces of European countries since the be- ginning of the aerostatic type aircraft using for conducting air reconnaissance dur- ing the Napoleonic wars since the end of the 18th century. The first times of aircraft combat using are described and their results are estimated by contemporaries of the events under consideration. It is being considered the organizational activity of the military-political leadership of the states, public organizations, individual persons and determined their influence on the development of aeronautics, aircraft indus- try, creation of the first aviation units, military aviation schools and deployment of technical personnel training, in particular, on the territory of Ukraine, which at that time was part of the Russian Empire. In addition, emphasis was placed on a number of features of command and control organizations responsible for the development of aviation in the armed forces of the leading countries of the world at that time, namely, laying responsibility for the development of aviation on the command and control organizations of high-tech troops (special forces), predominance in their activity functions of maintenance management and aviation equipment ordering, lack in their activities an aviation units operational management functions, which was observed before the World War I. The contribution of some Ukrainian-related military, state and public personalities in the global context of aviation genesis also being appropriately addressed. \u0430\u0432\u0456\u0430\u0446\u0456\u044f; \u0422\u043e\u043c 33, \u2116 3 (2019): \u0412\u043e\u0454\u043d\u043d\u043e-\u0456\u0441\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0447\u043d\u0438\u0439 \u0432\u0456\u0441\u043d\u0438\u043a; 175-183 ; 2707-1391 ; 2707-1383 Reznik, V.I."},{"id":"3180755b08a7cf004948ccf897a6f615c97bb89956de197229d9ca592554cf82","content":"LEADERSHIP TRAITS OF FUTURE LECTURERS OF HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS ; \u041b\u0418\u0414\u0415\u0420\u0421\u041a\u0418\u0415 \u041a\u0410\u0427\u0415\u0421\u0422\u0412\u0410 \u0411\u0423\u0414\u0423\u0429\u0418\u0425 \u041f\u0420\u0415\u041f\u041e\u0414\u0410\u0412\u0410\u0422\u0415\u041b\u0415\u0419 \u0412\u042b\u0421\u0428\u0418\u0425 \u0423\u0427\u0415\u0411\u041d\u042b\u0425 \u0417\u0410\u0412\u0415\u0414\u0415\u041d\u0418\u0419 ; \u041b\u0406\u0414\u0415\u0420\u0421\u042c\u041a\u0406 \u042f\u041a\u041e\u0421\u0422\u0406 \u041c\u0410\u0419\u0411\u0423\u0422\u041d\u0406\u0425 \u0412\u0418\u041a\u041b\u0410\u0414\u0410\u0427\u0406\u0412 \u0417\u0410\u041a\u041b\u0410\u0414\u0406\u0412 \u0412\u0418\u0429\u041e\u0407 \u041e\u0421\u0412\u0406\u0422\u0418 the results of the study of leadership traits of future lecturers of higher education institutions are presented in the article. The description of groups of leadership traits, which are necessary for the future lecturer for the beginning of professional activity and further personal and professional growth, in particular are highlighted: cognitive traits (problem solving, creativity); individual-psychological traits (openness, pleasantness, neuro-psychological stability, motivation for success, inclination to leadership); social and psychological traits (emotional self-awareness, emotion management, self-motivation, empathy, social skills); moral and value traits (honesty, justice). The analysis of results of the survey and testing of undergraduates - future lecturers of higher education institutions, which showed that the average level of development of all leadership traits considered in the study is presented. As a promising research direction, the development of a program of development of leadership traits of future lecturers of higher education institutions is highlighted. ; \u0432 Promotion in the Post-Soviet Space ; \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0430 \u0421\u0428\u0410 \u043f\u043e \u00ab\u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0432\u0438\u0436\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044e \u0434\u0435\u043c\u043e\u043a\u0440\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0438\u00bb \u043d\u0430 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0441\u043e\u0432\u0435\u0442\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043c \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0435 After the collapse of the USSR, U.S. Administrations exploited the policy of \u00abdemocracy promotion\u00bb to expand American influence in the post-Soviet space and to counterbalance Russia. In the light of the military campaign in Syria, the escalation around Iran, North Korea and Venezuela, the importance of the post-Soviet space for the US foreign policy has declined, U.S. aid to the region was cut. However, the Trump Administration maintains interest in keeping loyal elites in power to ensure the implementation of reforms and business projects, in particular, with a view to export U.S. military equipment and liquefied natural gas. The U.S. primary goal is to counteract Russian influence in the region, to prevent post-Soviet republics from building stronger ties with Moscow and reorient them towards the \u00abcollective West\u00bb. ; \u043f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0435 \u0440\u0430\u0441\u043f\u0430\u0434\u0430 \u0421\u0421\u0421\u0420 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0430
