The aim of the study is to examine the impact of empowering leadership and knowledg sharing in terms of performance criterias in the service sector (logistics companies). As a result of surveys collected from logistics companies, the effect of empowering leadership and knowledge sharing on employee performance, organizational performance and job performance variables were determined. In the scope of aim of the study, a survey was conducted with 386 personnel working in the logistic companies. Data analysis was done using SPSS 25 and LISREL 8.80 programs. After factor and reliability analyses, correlation analysis, regression analysis were performed and also sobel test was done for the analysis of measuring the mediating variable effect. G\u00fc\u00e7lendirici Liderlik,Bilgi Payla\u015f\u0131m\u0131,\u00c7al\u0131\u015fan Performans\u0131,\u00d6rg\u00fctsel Performans,\u0130\u015f Performans\u0131; Empowering Leadership,Knowledge Sharing,Employee Performance,Organizational Performance,Job Performance Volume: 7, Issue: 2 593-612 ; 2148-4228 ; Optimum Ekonomi ve Y\u00f6netim Bilimleri Dergisi S\u00d6NMEZ \u00c7AKIR, Fatma; ADIG\u00dcZEL, Zafer"},{"id":"b9f32ec4e432a169a6033496bdba030b4cdb14db03a5d93d0902e7c2fabeabe8","content":"The Effect Of Servant Leadersh\u0131p Percept\u0131on On Job Stress: A Research On C\u0131v\u0131l A\u0131rl\u0131ne Transportat\u0131on Employees ; Hizmetkar Liderlik Alg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n \u0130\u015f Stresine Etkisi: Sivil Havayolu Ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00c7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131 \u00dczerine Bir Ara\u015ft\u0131rma Stress is a factor that should be managed for individuals and organizations, otherwise it can cause physical and mental problems. In this study, it is aimed to reveal the effect of servant leadership perception of ground services employees towards their managers on job stresses. In this context, a survey was conducted with 138 aircraft maintenance technicians working at Istanbul Airport. The data obtained were firstly subjected to validity and reliability analyzes. Afterwards, multiple linear regression analyzes were conducted to examine the effect of perception of servant leadership on job stress. According to the analysis, it was concluded that servant leadership has an effect that reduces job stress. The study is expected to fill the gap in the literature due to the low number of studies examining the impact of servant leadership on job stress. Besides, the fact that no similar study was found in terms of civil air transport is the original aspect of the study. ; Stres, bireyler ve organizasyonlar i\u00e7in y\u00f6netilmesi gereken aksi taktirde fiziksel ve ruhsal sorunlara yok a\u00e7abilecek bir unsurdur. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, yer hizmetleri \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n y\u00f6neticilerine kar\u015f\u0131 hizmetkar liderlik alg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n i\u015f streslerine olan etkisinin ortaya konulmas\u0131 ama\u00e7lanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu ba\u011flamda \u0130stanbul Havaliman\u0131nda g\u00f6revli 138 u\u00e7ak bak\u0131m teknisyeni ile bir anket \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. Elde edilen veriler \u00f6ncelikle ge\u00e7erlilik ve g\u00fcvenilirlik analizlerine tabi tutulmu\u015ftur. Daha sonra hizmetkar liderlik alg\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n i\u015f stresi \u00fczerindeki etkisini ortaya koymak i\u00e7in \u00e7oklu do\u011frusal regresyon analizleri yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yap\u0131lan analizlere g\u00f6re hizmetkar liderli\u011fin i\u015f stresini azalt\u0131c\u0131 bir etkiye sahip oldu\u011fu sonucuna ula\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Hizmetkar liderli\u011fin i\u015f stresi \u00fczerindeki etkisini inceleyen \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n azl\u0131\u011f\u0131 nedeniyle \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n literat\u00fcrdeki bo\u015flu\u011fu doldurmaya yard\u0131mc\u0131 olmas\u0131 beklenmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca sivil havayolu ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan benzer \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmaya rastlan\u0131lmam\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n \u00f6zg\u00fcn y\u00f6n\u00fcd\u00fcr. Servant Leadership,Job Stress,Civil Airline Transportation; Hizmetkar Liderlik,\u0130\u015f Stresi,Sivil Havayolu Ta\u015f\u0131mac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 Volume: 8, Issue: 1 65-78 ; 2602-2125 ; Yorum Y\u00f6netim Y\u00f6ntem Uluslararas\u0131 Y\u00f6netim Ekonomi ve Felsefe Dergisi \u00c7\u0130\u00c7EK, Berat"},{"id":"15b68a6eff4f91d1fe49135d219faffda17509746d2d28a1f1b2a610728c556d","content":"Model of Performance Improvement of Certified Teachers in Private Vocational Schools Purpose: This study aimed to investigate a performance development model of the certified teachers at private vocational schools through school principal leadership, working environment, and teachers\u2019 alleviating motivation. Research Method: This research was conducted using a descriptive correlation approach with a multiple regression analysis. The data were collected using a purposive random sampling technique with total respondents of 118 certified teachers from various private vocational schools in Tegal, Central Java, Indonesia. The data were gathered through questionnaires and then analyzed using SPSS 12. Findings: The regression analysis testing results indicated that (1) school principal leadership with the correlation coefficient of 0.83 positively and significantly influenced the performance of certified teachers by 82.8%, (2) working environment with the correlation coefficient of 0.877 positively and significantly influenced the performance of certified teachers by 87.7%, and (3) affiliating motivation with the correlation coefficient of 0.035 did not positively and significantly influence the performance of certified teachers by 3.50%. The results of multiple regression analysis showed that performance of certified teachers was influenced by school principal leadership, working environment, and teachers\u2019 affiliating motivation. Implications for Research and Practice: Based on the research results, it is suggested that the private vocational principals should continuously improve their leadership and create positive working environments as these variables positively influence teachers\u2019 performance, while teachers\u2019 affiliating motivation should also be considered Certified teachers\u2019 performance,school principal leadership Volume: 20, Issue: 86 25-38 ; 1302-597X ; 2528-8911 ; Eurasian Journal of Educational Research RUSMAN, Ade; -, Sug\u0131yono; -, Suyanto"},{"id":"526af0407e805538eeef6c0b79102192153de103366c7041faaa20658690e1b4","content":"Okul Y\u00f6neticilerinin S\u0131n\u0131f \u00d6\u011fretmenlerine Hizmet \u0130\u00e7i E\u011fitim Yoluyla Kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 Gereken De\u011ferlere \u0130li\u015fkin G\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fleri ; School Administrators\u2019 Opinions Related to the Values that should Be Gained to Classroom Teachers through In-Service Training Problem Durumu: \u0130lkokul e\u011fitimi, \u00f6rg\u00fcn e\u011fitimin ilk basama\u011f\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturdu\u011fu i\u00e7in \u00f6\u011frencilere temel bilgi, beceri, tutum, de\u011fer ve davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131n kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131nda ayr\u0131 bir \u00f6neme sahiptir. Bu s\u00fcre\u00e7te tutum ve de\u011ferler, \u00f6\u011frencilere b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenleri taraf\u0131ndan kazand\u0131r\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenli\u011finin, di\u011fer \u00f6\u011fretmenlik alanlar\u0131 i\u00e7inde daha \u00f6zel bir yeri oldu\u011fu s\u00f6ylenebilir. S\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerinin \u00f6\u011frencilerin yeti\u015fmesi ve geli\u015fimindeki \u00f6zel konumu nedeniyle sahip olmalar\u0131 gereken mesleki de\u011ferler, olduk\u00e7a \u00f6nemli bir konu olarak de\u011ferlendirilmektedir. \u00d6\u011fretmenlerin, \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin gerektirdi\u011fi niteliklerle donan\u0131ml\u0131 olarak yeti\u015fmesi, Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131n belirledi\u011fi e\u011fitim politikalar\u0131n\u0131n ve uygulamalar\u0131n ba\u015far\u0131s\u0131na da olumlu katk\u0131lar sa\u011flar. \u00d6te yandan \u00f6\u011fretmenler, geli\u015fmeleri yak\u0131ndan izleyen, eksiklikleri sorgulayan entelekt\u00fcel bir ya\u015fam\u0131n mimar\u0131 ve zihinsel g\u00fcc\u00fcn temsilcisidir. Bu y\u00fczden \u00fclkenin varl\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve toplum olarak devam\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flayacak ku\u015faklar\u0131n dengeli bir ki\u015fili\u011fe sahip olmalar\u0131 yan\u0131nda bilimsel, k\u00fclt\u00fcrel ve sanatsal a\u00e7\u0131dan yeterli bir \u015fekilde yeti\u015fmesinde aktif olarak rol alan ve sorumluluk \u00fcstlenen \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin mesleki de\u011ferler a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan yeterli olmas\u0131 olduk\u00e7a \u00f6nemlidir.Okuldaki ilk y\u0131llar, \u00e7ocu\u011fun yeti\u015fkin ya\u015fam\u0131na haz\u0131rlanmas\u0131na temel olu\u015fturdu\u011fundan, bu d\u00f6nemde kazan\u0131lan bilgi ve beceriler, di\u011fer e\u011fitim basamaklar\u0131nda kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak bilgi ve beceriler i\u00e7in alt yap\u0131 niteli\u011fi ta\u015f\u0131maktad\u0131r. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, ilerleyen e\u011fitim basamaklar\u0131nda, \u00f6\u011frencilerin sergiledi\u011fi tutum ve davran\u0131\u015flar, b\u00fcy\u00fck \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerinin kazand\u0131rd\u0131\u011f\u0131 bilgi, beceri, tutum ve de\u011ferlerin birer yans\u0131mas\u0131 olmaktad\u0131r. Bu durum, son y\u0131llarda e\u011fitim politikac\u0131lar\u0131 ve uzmanlar\u0131n de\u011ferler e\u011fitimi ve mesleki de\u011ferler konular\u0131 \u00fczerine yo\u011funla\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131n nedenini ortaya koymaktad\u0131r. S\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerinin mesleki de\u011ferler bak\u0131m\u0131ndan yeterli olmalar\u0131, \u00f6\u011frencilerin geli\u015fimi a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan kritik bir \u00f6nem ta\u015f\u0131d\u0131\u011f\u0131 i\u00e7in \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin temel yeterlik alanlar\u0131ndan biri olarak kabul edilmektedir.Alanyaz\u0131n incelendi\u011finde, \u00f6\u011fretmenlere y\u00f6nelik hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131nda, \u00e7o\u011funlukla hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n belirlenmesi \u00fczerinde duruldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. \u00d6te yandan \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim ihtiya\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n \u00f6ncelik d\u00fczeyinin \u00f6\u011fretmen ve okul y\u00f6neticilerinin g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flerine g\u00f6re \u00f6nemli \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fcde farkl\u0131la\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca alanyaz\u0131nda, \u00f6\u011fretmenlere hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gereken \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin temel de\u011ferlerine ili\u015fkin \u00e7ok s\u0131n\u0131rl\u0131 say\u0131da ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n oldu\u011fu anla\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Oysa okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrlerinin bak\u0131\u015f a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131yla \u00f6\u011fretmenlere hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gereken de\u011ferlerin bilinmesi, okullarda \u00f6\u011frencilere kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak ki\u015fisel, k\u00fclt\u00fcrel ve evrensel insan de\u011ferleri a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan olduk\u00e7a \u00f6nemlidir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n Amac\u0131: Son y\u0131llarda e\u011fitim politikac\u0131lar\u0131 ve uzmanlar, de\u011ferler ve \u00f6zellikle mesleki de\u011ferler \u00fczerine yo\u011funla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 halde s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenleri ve okul y\u00f6neticileri ile yap\u0131lan az say\u0131da \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, mesleki de\u011ferlere at\u0131fta bulunulmas\u0131, \u00f6nemli bir problem durumu olarak ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131, okul y\u00f6neticilerinin g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flerine g\u00f6re hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerine kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak de\u011ferleri ortaya koymakt\u0131r. Bu ama\u00e7la a\u015fa\u011f\u0131daki sorulara yan\u0131t aranmaktad\u0131r:1. S\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerine hangi de\u011ferler kazand\u0131r\u0131lmal\u0131d\u0131r?2. S\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerine kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak de\u011ferlerin \u00f6ncelik d\u00fczeyi nedir?Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n Y\u00f6ntemi: Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma, nitel ara\u015ft\u0131rma desenlerinden biri olan durum \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmas\u0131 modelindedir. Bu ara\u015ft\u0131rmada, b\u00fct\u00fcnc\u00fcl tek durum deseni kullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma grubunu, \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct \u00f6rnekleme y\u00f6ntemiyle belirlenen 24 okul y\u00f6neticisi olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Okul y\u00f6neticilerinin 19\u2019unu erkek, 5\u2019ini ise kad\u0131n y\u00f6neticiler olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar\u0131n ya\u015f ortalamas\u0131, 38.50\u2019dir. Kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar\u0131n meslek k\u0131demi ortalamas\u0131 19.25 y\u0131l ve y\u00f6neticilik k\u0131demi ortalamas\u0131 13.50 y\u0131ld\u0131r. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fma grubunun belirlenmesinde, en az be\u015f y\u0131l s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenli\u011fi yapm\u0131\u015f olma temel \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct olarak belirlenmi\u015ftir. En az be\u015f y\u0131l \u00f6\u011fretmen olarak g\u00f6rev yapman\u0131n \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct olarak belirlenmesinin nedeni, okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrlerinin \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin sahip olmalar\u0131 gereken de\u011ferlerin neler oldu\u011funu daha iyi kestirebileceklerinin \u00f6ng\u00f6r\u00fclmesidir. E\u011fitim y\u00f6netimi alan\u0131nda y\u00fcksek lisans derecesini tamamlam\u0131\u015f veya devam ediyor olmak ba\u015fka bir \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct olarak belirlenmi\u015ftir. E\u011fitim y\u00f6netimi alan\u0131nda y\u00fcksek lisans yapm\u0131\u015f ya da yap\u0131yor olman\u0131n \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct olarak al\u0131nm\u0131\u015f olmas\u0131n\u0131n nedeni, kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar\u0131n s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerine kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak de\u011ferlere ili\u015fkin fark\u0131ndal\u0131k d\u00fczeylerinin y\u00fcksek olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n varsay\u0131lmas\u0131d\u0131r. En az be\u015f y\u0131l boyunca okul y\u00f6neticisi olarak g\u00f6rev yapmak, bir ba\u015fka \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct olarak belirlenmi\u015ftir. Kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131larda, en az be\u015f y\u0131l okul y\u00f6neticisi olarak g\u00f6rev yapm\u0131\u015f olma ko\u015fulunun aranmas\u0131n\u0131n nedeni ise be\u015f y\u0131ll\u0131k deneyimin \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin hangi de\u011ferlere gereksinim duydu\u011funun daha iyi anlamay\u0131 sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n varsay\u0131lmas\u0131d\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca, hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim faaliyetlerine kat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olmak ba\u015fka bir \u00f6l\u00e7\u00fct olarak belirlenmi\u015ftir. Kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131larda, hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitim etkinliklerine kat\u0131lm\u0131\u015f olma ko\u015fulunun aranmas\u0131n\u0131n amac\u0131 ise kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131lar\u0131n hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitim etkinliklerinin y\u00f6ntem ve i\u00e7eri\u011finin fark\u0131nda olmas\u0131n\u0131n ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n amac\u0131na daha uygun olaca\u011f\u0131n\u0131n varsay\u0131lmas\u0131d\u0131r.Veri Analizi: Veriler, betimsel analiz tekni\u011fi ile analiz edilmi\u015ftir. Betimsel analiz tekni\u011fi, (1) analiz i\u00e7in tematik bir \u00e7er\u00e7eve olu\u015fturma, (2) verilerin tematik \u00e7er\u00e7eveye g\u00f6re i\u015flenmesi, (3) bulgular\u0131 tan\u0131mlama, (4) bulgular\u0131 analiz etme ve yorumlama olmak \u00fczere d\u00f6rt a\u015famadan olu\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Yap\u0131land\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f grid formlar\u0131 analiz \u00f6ncesinde ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar taraf\u0131ndan s\u0131ras\u0131yla K1, K2, K3, K4, . K24 \u015feklinde kodlanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. B\u00fct\u00fcn g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fler tabloda g\u00f6sterilmi\u015f ve benzer \u015fekilde yaz\u0131lan g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fler ayn\u0131 kategoride de\u011ferlendirilmi\u015ftir. Okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrleri, toplam 240 kategori olu\u015fturmu\u015f ve bu kategorilere g\u00f6re \u00f6\u011fretmenlere kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak toplam 59 de\u011fer belirlenmi\u015ftir. Alt temalar, ayn\u0131 i\u00e7eri\u011fi yans\u0131tan kategorilerden olu\u015fturulmu\u015ftur. Betimsel analiz sonucunda kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flerine dayal\u0131 olarak d\u00f6rt ana tema belirlenmi\u015ftir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n Bulgular\u0131: Ara\u015ft\u0131rmadan elde edilen sonu\u00e7lara g\u00f6re, okul y\u00f6neticileri \u00f6\u011fretmenlere daha \u00e7ok ki\u015fisel de\u011ferlerin kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi y\u00f6n\u00fcnde g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f belirtmektedir. Bu de\u011ferler aras\u0131nda, okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrlerinin en fazla vurgulad\u0131\u011f\u0131 ki\u015fisel de\u011ferler yenili\u011fe a\u00e7\u0131kl\u0131k, \u00e7al\u0131\u015fkanl\u0131k, sab\u0131r, kararl\u0131l\u0131k, fark\u0131ndal\u0131k, d\u00fcr\u00fcstl\u00fck, nezaket, empati, giri\u015fimcilik, tutarl\u0131l\u0131k ve g\u00fcvenilirliktir. Okul y\u00f6neticileri, \u00f6\u011fretmenlere mesleki de\u011ferler kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fini ifade etmektedir. Okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrleri taraf\u0131ndan en fazla vurgulanan mesleki de\u011ferler ileti\u015fim, liderlik, yarat\u0131c\u0131l\u0131k, i\u015fbirli\u011fi, dayan\u0131\u015fma, vizyon, planl\u0131l\u0131k, uyumluluk ve ko\u015fulsuz kabuld\u00fcr. Okul y\u00f6neticileri, \u00f6\u011fretmenlere hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla evrensel de\u011ferlerin kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi \u015feklinde g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015f belirtmektedir. Okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrleri, \u00f6\u011fretmenlere kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gereken evrensel de\u011ferleri, sevgi, adalet, ho\u015fg\u00f6r\u00fc, h\u00fcmanizm, sayg\u0131, demokratik tutum ve farkl\u0131l\u0131klara sayg\u0131 \u015feklinde ifade etmektedir. Okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrleri, ayr\u0131ca hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla \u00f6\u011fretmenlere k\u00fclt\u00fcrel de\u011ferler kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi \u015feklinde g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fler belirtmektedir. Okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrleri, hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla \u00f6\u011fretmenlere kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gereken ba\u015fl\u0131ca k\u00fclt\u00fcrel de\u011ferleri vatanseverlik, fedak\u00e2rl\u0131k ve \u00f6zverili olma \u015feklinde ifade etmektedir.Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n Sonu\u00e7lar\u0131 ve \u00d6neriler: Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n sonu\u00e7lar\u0131, okul m\u00fcd\u00fcrlerinin s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmenlerine hizmet i\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla ki\u015fisel, mesleki, evrensel ve k\u00fclt\u00fcrel de\u011ferlerin kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 gerekti\u011fi \u015feklinde g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015flere sahip oldu\u011funu ortaya koymaktad\u0131r. Bu sonu\u00e7lara dayal\u0131 olarak her \u00f6\u011fretmenin \u00f6ncelikle ki\u015fisel de\u011ferlere sahip olmaya \u00f6ncelik vermesi gerekti\u011fi ifade edilebilir. \u00d6\u011fretmenler, \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin temel de\u011ferlerine ve etik ilkelerine sahip olmal\u0131d\u0131r. Milli E\u011fitim Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 taraf\u0131ndan \u00f6\u011fretmenlere hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitim arac\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 ile \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin temel mesleki de\u011ferleri kazand\u0131r\u0131lmal\u0131d\u0131r. \u00d6\u011fretmen yeti\u015ftiren kurumlarda, \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin genel yeterliklerinin yan\u0131 s\u0131ra mesleki ve etik de\u011ferlerin kazand\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131na \u00f6zen g\u00f6sterilmelidir. \u00d6\u011fretmenlere hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitim yoluyla, de\u011fi\u015fen de\u011ferler ve k\u00fcresel geli\u015fmeler \u0131\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00f6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin temel mesleki de\u011ferleri, k\u00fclt\u00fcrel ve evrensel de\u011ferlerle uyumlu olacak \u015fekilde yeniden kazand\u0131r\u0131lmal\u0131d\u0131r. \u00d6\u011fretmenlere, okullar\u0131nda kararl\u0131, sab\u0131rl\u0131, yenili\u011fe a\u00e7\u0131k tutum ve davran\u0131\u015flar sergilemeyi sa\u011flayacak hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitimler verilmelidir. \u00d6\u011fretmenlerin etkili ileti\u015fim, liderlik ve i\u015fbirli\u011fi becerilerini geli\u015ftiren hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitimler yer verilmelidir. Hizmeti\u00e7i e\u011fitimler, \u00f6\u011fretmenlerin mesle\u011finde \u00e7al\u0131\u015fkan, vatansever ve fedak\u00e2r olmalar\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamal\u0131d\u0131r. \u00d6\u011fretmenlere kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak de\u011ferler, \u00f6\u011frencilere sevgi ile yakla\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131 sa\u011flamal\u0131, adaletli bir tutum sergilemelerini garanti etmeli, g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc bir insanl\u0131k sevgisi a\u015f\u0131lamal\u0131d\u0131r. Bu ara\u015ft\u0131rma nitel ara\u015ft\u0131rma deseninde y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclm\u00fc\u015f ve veriler yar\u0131 yap\u0131land\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f grid formu ile toplanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00d6\u011fretmenlere kazand\u0131r\u0131lacak mesleki de\u011ferler, ki\u015fisel de\u011ferler, evrensel ve k\u00fclt\u00fcrel de\u011ferler konular\u0131nda farkl\u0131 desenlerde ve farkl\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma gruplar\u0131 ile ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar planlanabilir. \u00d6\u011fretmenlik mesle\u011finin de\u011fi\u015fen de\u011ferleri konusunda ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclebilir. ; Purpose: Social changes and developments in educational policies bring along changes in the values of the teaching profession. The changing values increase the in-service training needs of the teachers. Although it is aimed to gain prospective teachers the values of the teaching profession in the pre-service period, it is seen that the target is not sufficiently achieved. The present research aims to investigate administrators\u2019 opinions regarding the values that should be gained among classroom teachers through in-service training. Research Methods: This study was designed in a qualitative, case study pattern. The study group was 24 school administrators working in primary schools. The participants were determined using a criterion sampling method. The data were collected by a semi-structured grid form developed by the researchers. Findings: The values to be gained during in-service training among classroom teachers were (i) personal values: openness to innovation, diligence, patience, awareness, honesty, politeness, empathy, consistency and reliability, (ii) professional values: communication, leadership, creativity, collaboration, solidarity and vision, (iii) universal values: love, justice, tolerance and humanism and (iv) cultural values: patriotism, self-devotion and work selflessly. The personal values were in the first priority order of the values that should be gained class teachers through in-service training. Implications for Research and Practice: The findings reveal that classroom teachers should be trained with personal, professional, universal and cultural values in the in-service training process. The personal values should include the values, such as openness to innovation, diligence, patience, awareness, honesty, politeness, empathy; professional values should include the values, such as communication, leadership, creativity, collaboration, solidarity and vision. De\u011ferler,s\u0131n\u0131f \u00f6\u011fretmeni; values,classroom teacher Volume: 20, Issue: 86 175-196 ; 1302-597X ; 2528-8911 ; Eurasian Journal of Educational Research SEZER, Senol; KARABACAK, Nermin; KUCUK, Mehmet; KORKMAZ, Isa"},{"id":"bf45d83525686c93fd5b9a4f68fa108feb95182dc0b32c8e3473b843d5471051","content":"The Relationship Between Leadership Capacity and Organizational Commitment in Educational Institutions The purpose of this research; To determine the relationship between perceived leadership capacity and teachers' organizational commitment levels in Primary and Secondary Schools under the Ministry of National Education. The sample of the research consists of teachers working in the Primary and Secondary Schools in the city center of U\u015fak in the 2018-2019 academic year. The research was designed according to the correlational design; data were collected with likert type measurement tools. In the interpretation of the data regarding the answers given by the teachers for the questionnaires, the obtained data were interpreted by evaluating them in terms of frequency (f), percent (%), arithmetic mean (\ud835\udc65\u0305) and standard deviations (ss). In order to determine the relationship between the perceived leadership capacity level and the organizational commitment levels of teachers, a pearson moment product correlation analysis was performed. A positive, moderate and significant relationship was found between the organizational commitment levels of teachers and the level of perceived leadership capacity sub-dimensions of the distributed leadership level, shared school vision, collaboration and shared responsibility, perceived student achievement and total leadership capacity perceptions. As teachers' distributed leadership characteristics, shared school vision, collaboration and shared sense of responsibility, and perceived student success increase, total commitment levels also increase. leadership capacity Volume: 7, Issue: 1 105-126 ; 2651-4206 ; Osmangazi Journal of Educational Research SIRIKLIG\u0130L, Ramazan; DEM\u0130RHAN, G\u00f6khan"},{"id":"dfb12ceb1537979ba73ba03119460afacf92bf552fcf8952bcd3fa6b99c63ba4","content":"Duygusal Zek\u00e2 ve Liderlik ; Emotional Intelligence And Leadership Son y\u0131llarda yap\u0131lan ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar, mant\u0131ksal zek\u00e2n\u0131n \u00f6zel ve i\u015f ya\u015fam\u0131ndaki ba\u015far\u0131ya katk\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7ok fazla olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermektedir. Bu do\u011frultuda duygusal zek\u00e2 kavram\u0131 \u00f6n plana \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Duygusal zek\u00e2, mant\u0131\u011f\u0131n etkisinin azalmas\u0131na de\u011fil, insan duygular\u0131n\u0131n vazge\u00e7ilmezli\u011fine dayanmaktad\u0131r. Bir anlamda bu kavram toplumsal alanda duygu ile d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcnceyi bar\u0131\u015ft\u0131rmaya y\u00f6nelik bir hareketin sonucudur. \u0130\u015fletmeler, b\u00fcy\u00fcme ve geli\u015fmesini engelleyen durumlar\u0131na y\u00f6nelik \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm bulma konusunda zorluk ya\u015famaktad\u0131r. Bu zorluklara uygun \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcmler getirme noktas\u0131nda sorumluluk \u00f6ncelikle liderlere verilmi\u015ftir. Y\u00fcksek duygusal zek\u00e2ya sahip liderler, kendilerinin ve \u00e7al\u0131\u015fanlar\u0131n\u0131n duygular\u0131n\u0131 y\u00f6netebilen, motive edebilen, etkin ili\u015fkiler kurabilen, onlar\u0131n i\u015f tatminlerini ve performanslar\u0131n\u0131 art\u0131rabilen ki\u015filerdir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada da, duygusal zek\u00e2 kavram\u0131 ve \u00f6nemi anlat\u0131lmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ayr\u0131ca, y\u00fcksek duygusal zek\u00e2ya sahip liderlerin kurumsal ba\u015far\u0131ya etkisi \u00fczerinde durulmu\u015ftur. ; Researches made in recent years show that logical intelligence does not contribute much to the success of private and business life. Accordingly, the concept of emotional intelligence comes to the fore. Emotional intelligence is based on the indispensability of human emotions, not on the reduction of the influence of logic. In a sense, it is the result of a movement to reconcile emotion and thought in the social sphere. Businesses have difficulties in finding solutions for situations that prevent growth and development. At the point of bringing appropriate solutions to these challenges, it has given the responsibility primarily to the leaders. Leaders with high emotional intelligence are those who can manage, motivate, build effective relationships, and improve their job satisfaction and performance. In this study, the concept and importance of emotional intelligence is tried to be explained, and the effect of leaders with high emotional intelligence on corporate success is emphasized. Duygusal zek\u00e2,liderlik,liderlerde duygusal zeka; Emotional intelligence,leadership,emotional intelligence in leaders Volume: 3, Issue: 1 9-28 ; 2636-8749 ; Muhakeme Dergisi VARDARLIER, Pelin; YAPICI, Hatice K\u00fcbra"},{"id":"ef16bfbefa818af96dfcb16f9393c43df42b00a722d40c1beda2c6624ab33bbd","content":"Tuna Bulgarlar\u0131n\u0131n Hristiyanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 Kabul Etmesinin Siyasi Nedenleri ; Political reasons for Danube Bulgarians accepting Christianity Asparuh \u00f6nderli\u011finde G\u00f6k Tengri inan\u0131\u015f\u0131na mensup olan Onogur-Bulgarlar\u2019\u0131n\u0131n Tuna\u2019ya gelmeleri ve burada devlet kurmalar\u0131 yakla\u015f\u0131k VII. y\u00fczy\u0131la denk gelmektedir. Bulgarlar\u0131n gelmi\u015f olduklar\u0131 topraklarda ve h\u00e2kimiyeti alt\u0131na ald\u0131klar\u0131 yerli Slav n\u00fcfusu pagan inan\u0131\u015fa mensuptur. Her iki etnik grubun farkl\u0131 inan\u0131\u015f sistemine mensup olmalar\u0131, onlar\u0131n uzun s\u00fcre yan yana bar\u0131\u015f i\u00e7inde ya\u015famalar\u0131na engel olmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00f6\u00e7ebe olan Bulgar T\u00fcrkleri Omurtag d\u00f6neminden itibaren yerle\u015fik hayata ge\u00e7meleri ve Slav n\u00fcfusuyla evlenmeleri neticesinde Slav ve Slavca konu\u015fan n\u00fcfusun \u00e7o\u011falmas\u0131na neden olmu\u015ftur. Di\u011fer taraftan Balkanlarda, Bulgarlara en yak\u0131n kom\u015fular\u0131 olan Moravya ve Franklar\u2019\u0131n Hristiyanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 kabul\u00fc ve siyasi anlamda g\u00fc\u00e7lenmeleri, Bulgar Hanlar\u0131n\u0131n s\u0131n\u0131r b\u00f6lgesinde yerle\u015fik n\u00fcfusu kontrol alt\u0131na almalar\u0131n\u0131 zorla\u015ft\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Bulgaristan\u2019\u0131n g\u00fcneyindeki Bizans \u0130mparatorlu\u011fu\u2019nun Roma kilisesiyle bitmek bilmeyen gerginlikleri ve her ikisinin de di\u011ferine g\u00f6re kendini \u00fcst\u00fcn g\u00f6rme \u00e7abas\u0131 uzun s\u00fcre devam etmi\u015ftir. \u0130ki g\u00fc\u00e7 aras\u0131nda devam eden bu kavga yan\u0131 ba\u015f\u0131nda askeri anlamda g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc olan Bulgarlar\u0131n g\u00f6z\u00fcnden ka\u00e7mam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Biz bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada IX. y\u00fczy\u0131lda Bulgarlar\u0131n toplu halde Hristiyanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n kabul\u00fc ve devletin resmi din ilan edilmesi ile ilgili siyasi nedenlerini ele al\u0131narak de\u011ferlendirece\u011fiz. ; Onogur-Bulgarians, belonging to the belief of G\u00f6k Tengri (Sky-God), came to the Danube and established a state there in the 7th century under the leadership of Asparuh. The indigenous Slavic population in the lands that the Bulgarians passed from and dominated was a pagan belief. The fact that both ethnic groups belonged to a different belief system did not prevent them from living side by side in peace. As a result of the nomadic Bulgarian Turks' resident life since the Omurtag period and their marriage to the Slavic population, the Slav and Slavic speaking population increased. On the other hand, in the Balkans, the closest neighbors of Bulgarians, Moravia and the Francs, accepted Christianity and strengthened politically, making it difficult for the Bulgarian Khan to control the settled population in the border area. The endless tensions with the Roman church of the Byzantine Empire in the south of Bulgaria, and the effort to see themselves superior to the others, continued for a long time. This fight between the two forces did not escape the eyes of the Bulgarians who were militarily strong. In this study, the political reasons of Bulgarians' acceptance of Christianity in the 9th century and the declaration of Christianity as the official religion of the state will be analyzed. Tuna Bulgarlar\u0131,Hristiyanl\u0131k,Boris,Bizans,Kilise; Danube Bulgarians,Christianity,Boris,Byzantine,Church Volume: 2, Issue: 1 61-90 ; 2687-3346 ; Journal of International Eastern European Studies ERGAN, G\u00fclnara"},{"id":"203d85457fbb9265a1bb9b764193b4f0de8f3040c6c7b7aaf5742125d3eef5b8","content":"An Analysis on Mission Statements of Turkish Primary Schools: Similarities and Differences Mission statements are increasingly becoming an inevitable component of educational institutions. The main reason behind this can be attributed to the fact that they are determinants for the accreditation of schools in today\u2019s competitive educational arena. Thus, gaining an insight into the emphasized concepts in mission statements of primary schools is essential since primary schools are the places where the education starts for every single individual. In this regard, the aim of this study is to provide a document analysis of mission statements of Turkish public primary schools which are governed by the Ministry of National Education. To achieve this, mission statements of 500 primary schools across Turkey were compiled; particularly schools from the Western and the Eastern parts of the country were randomly selected and included in the analysis. As well as the comparison between mission statements of schools located in two opposite sides of the country, a special attention was paid to whether any reference to language teaching and learning was available in the mission statements. The whole data were analysed via content analysis. The results give in-depth information about common and differing points among mission statements. The most common mission was found to be educating individuals who valued Atat\u00fcrk\u2019s principles and reforms underpinning the Turkish education system. Besides, a number of distinct missions were detected with regard to some targeted personality traits between the most cited points in missions of the Eastern and the Western schools. In terms of foreign language education, only a few references were revealed in mission statements of primary schools in Turkey. Mission statements,Turkish primary schools,School leadership,Educational management Volume: 5, Issue: 1 71-98 ; 2564-7261 ; Research in Educational Administration and Leadership TURHAN, Burcu; KIRKG\u00d6Z, Yasemin"},{"id":"214a6c05b642d2ac659f369a6ba7f9d8329e36074701e463c7e74ba3249165b9","content":"Principal Voice for Successful Policy Implementation: Lessons Learned from Teacher Tenure This study examined the perceptions of US school principals toward one US state\u2019s revamped teacher tenure law and how principals perceived that the law affected their ability to evaluate and retain effective teachers. Principal interviews indicated the law had a positive impact on their ability to evaluate and retain effective teachers despite barriers associated with the teacher evaluation system. Findings were examined through Hess\u2019 (1999) political attractiveness of reform framework. Results highlight that future research should examine stakeholder and principal voice in policy initiatives and education agendas. As such, a conceptual model for predicting the success of educational reform initiatives is provided. Qualitative,Teacher tenure,Teacher evaluation,Principal,Perception,Policy research,Principal voice Volume: 5, Issue: 1 234-273 ; 2564-7261 ; Research in Educational Administration and Leadership ANGELLE, Pamela S.; LOMASCOLO, David J."},{"id":"b72fb407f65d499db0f02e3e047b0ce71dd1e78956b3c0e021a6b95b05a4b6b6","content":"Social Theory and Education Research Understanding Foucault, Habermas, Bourdieu and Derrida For education researchers wishing to have a deep vision, social theory is a prolific source. Although they have benefitted from the work of a large number of theorists in this field, Jacques Derrida, Pierre Bourdieu, Michel Foucault and Jurgen Habermas are more influential in shaping contemporary education theories. book review Volume: 5, Issue: 1 324-328 ; 2564-7261 ; Research in Educational Administration and Leadership \u00c7EVEN, G\u00f6zde"},{"id":"c01ee79eca464def247095bbe5425a48105cf36d5c5f76c87ad02cd3a2695f8f","content":"Birinci D\u00fcnya Sava\u015f\u0131 \u00f6ncesi Osmanl\u0131 \u0130mparatorlu\u011funda Yap\u0131lan Yabanc\u0131 Yat\u0131r\u0131mlar ve Al\u0131nan Bor\u00e7larda Fransa\u2019n\u0131n Rol\u00fc ; The Role of France in Foreign Investments and Borrowings in the Ottoman Empire before the First World War Birinci D\u00fcnya sava\u015f\u0131 \u00f6ncesi sanayile\u015fmi\u015f \u00fclkeler, demiryolu yap\u0131m\u0131 ve bor\u00e7 verme konusunda Osmanl\u0131 \u0130mparatorlu\u011fu topraklar\u0131nda ciddi bir rekabete girmi\u015ftir. Sava\u015f \u00f6ncesi \u0130ngiltere demiryolu yap\u0131m\u0131 konusunda g\u00fcc\u00fcn\u00fc kaybederken Almanya ile Fransa aras\u0131ndaki rekabet artm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ancak Fransa yat\u0131r\u0131mlar konusunda liderli\u011fi elinden b\u0131rakmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Ayn\u0131 \u015fekilde Osmanl\u0131 Devletinin en \u00e7ok bor\u00e7land\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00fclke Fransa\u2019d\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, Frans\u0131z Ekonomi ve Finans Bakanl\u0131\u011f\u0131 ar\u015fiv belgelerinden yararlan\u0131larak, bu d\u00f6nemde Osmanl\u0131 topraklar\u0131nda Frans\u0131z sermayedarlar\u0131n\u0131n ald\u0131\u011f\u0131 demiryolu imtiyazlar\u0131, yapt\u0131klar\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mlar ve al\u0131nan d\u0131\u015f bor\u00e7lar a\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan Fransa\u2019n\u0131n rol\u00fc incelenmi\u015ftir. ; Before the First World War, there was a serious competition among the industrialized countries in the territory of the Ottoman Empire in terms of railway construction and lending. In the pre-war, Britain lost its power to build railways on Ottoman territories, while competition between Germany and France increased. However, France has not lost its leadership in investments. Likewise, the country that the Ottoman Empire borrowed the most from was France. In this study, the role of France in terms of railway concessions, investments and foreign debts in the Ottoman territories was examined by using the archive documents of the French Ministry of Economy and Finance. Osmanl\u0131 \u0130mparatorlu\u011fu,Fransa,demiryollar\u0131,d\u0131\u015f bor\u00e7lar,yabanc\u0131 yat\u0131r\u0131mlar; Ottoman Empire,France,railways,foreign debt,foreign investments Volume: 20, Issue: 1 1-17 ; 1302-9975 ; 2667-7229 ; Akdeniz \u0130\u0130BF Dergisi AYO\u011eLU DUMAN, Damla"},{"id":"f7a6027808b1c3cfdc73877b20a4f6a68c21f93f2f38e4485f08196b0e5bdeaf","content":"ACCUSATION OF COLLISION DIRECTED TO DEMOCRATIC PARTY DURING THE FOUNDATION PROCESS AND HANDLING OF THE ISSUE BY POLITICAL CIRCLES AND NEWSPAPERS ; KURULU\u015e S\u00dcREC\u0130NDE DEMOKRAT PART\u0130YE Y\u00d6NELT\u0130LEN MUVAZAA \u0130THAMI VE KONUNUN S\u0130YAS\u0130 \u00c7EVRELERDE VE GAZETELERDE ELE ALINI\u015eI Inonu, National Chief and invariable General President of CHP (Republican People\u2019s Party), and members of CHP made a claim in the days when the efforts for transition to multi-party system were ongoing intensely, i.e. in the foundation process of Democratic Party. According to that claim, it was asserted that recently established party, i.e. \u201cDemocratic Party was a collusion party\u201d. According to those circles, Bayar took permission from Inonu when Democratic Party was founded. Inonu, National Chief, was not leaning towards foundation of Democratic Party under the presidency of Bayar. Also, Bayar was always in contact with Inonu during the foundation process of the party. The country brought democracy upon the request of the members of CHP, and new parties were founded. The incident, which caused CHP circles to make such a claim, was the event when Bayar was invited to Cankaya Mansion by Inonu for a dinner on December 4, 1945 and the meal he had with Inonu in private. The members of CHP, who were not glad to see a new party being founded, interpreted this invitation for dinner differently. These circles made a fuss by saying \u201cthe new party is a collusion\u201d party. Inonu said, in relation with the aforementioned meeting, that the claims of collusion are not true by stating that Celal Bayar brought the program of Democrat Party, the party that they shall establish, to him by courtesy, that they made a conversation with him on their party, and that he did not offer or suggest anyone to establish a party. The actions towards the establishment of the Democratic Party started after the rejection of the \u201cMemorandum of the Four\u201d document in the CHP (Republican People's Party) Parliamentary group and subsequently the discharging of those who submitted that motion from the CHP. As a matter of fact, Cel\u00e2l Bayar states in his work titled Ba\u015fvekilim Menderes (My Prime Minister Menderes) that Adnan Menderes and Fuat K\u00f6pr\u00fcl\u00fc took the decision to establish a new party on the days they were expelled from the CHP. After these exportations, Celal Bayar resigned from his Izmir deputyship, and Refik Koraltan was exported from CHP due to violation of the party constitution, for his articles in Vatan Journal in which he defends his friends. Thus, the situation of those who submitted the Memorandum of the Four became certain. With \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc's opening speech on the Turkish Grand National Assembly on November 1, 1945, it was expressed that the opposition was organized in a separate party form and it was implied that the establishment of new parties would be welcomed. In public and press it was now expected that a new party would be established under the leadership of Celal Bayar. Thus, there were news regarding the establishment of a new party in the newspapers on November 28, 1945. "A new party is being established. It can be expected that this party will take an official shape soon." it said in an article published in Vatan newspaper on November 28, 1945. In the article, it was stated that the name of the party to be established would be "National Democratic Party", and that the core of the party to be established was composed of four interpellant people. It was also stated in the article that perhaps the word "national" would not be allowed to be put before the name of the new party, but a party that would be called "democrat" would soon be expected to take a legal form.The big day had finally come. As Bayar indicated in his statement, the program and regulation of the new party, which was founded on January 7, 1946 under the name of Democrat Party, would be announced. Bayar held a press conference in the evening of January 7th as expected. While the journalists who watched the press conference expected that Bayar would only explain the party program and its charter, the announcement surprised them. Because Bayar had announced that the Democrat Party was officially established and started to operate.In the press meeting held on January 7, 1946, founders of Democratic Party, such as Celal Bayar and Adnan Menderes, who were the addressee of the claims of collusion, made the following statement; \u201cCollusion is a frivolous act and none of us has a character to accept or make such an offer, and also, our country has no time to waste in collusive affairs\u201d, and thus, they refused such claims strictly. ; \u00c7ok-partili hayata ge\u00e7i\u015f \u00e7abalar\u0131n\u0131 yo\u011funla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00fcnlerde yani Demokrat Parti\u2019nin kurulu\u015f s\u00fcrecinde Milli \u015eef ve CHP De\u011fi\u015fmez Genel Ba\u015fkan\u0131 olan \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc ve CHP'liler ortaya bir iddia atm\u0131\u015flard\u0131. Bu iddia yeni kurulan partinin, yani \u201cDemokrat Parti'nin bir muvazaa partisi\u201d oldu\u011fuydu. Bu \u00e7evrelere g\u00f6re Demokrat Parti kurulurken Bayar, \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc'n\u00fcn iznini alm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Mill\u00ee \u015eef \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc, Demokrat Parti'nin Bayar ba\u015fkanl\u0131\u011f\u0131nda kurulmas\u0131na s\u0131cak bakm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Ayr\u0131ca partinin kurulu\u015f s\u00fcreci i\u00e7erisinde Bayar, \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc ile s\u00fcrekli bir ili\u015fki i\u00e7erisinde olmu\u015ftu. CHP'liler istedi\u011fi i\u00e7in \u00fclkede demokrasiye ge\u00e7ilmi\u015f ve yeni partiler kurulmu\u015ftu. CHP \u00e7evrelerinde b\u00f6yle bir iddian\u0131n ortaya at\u0131lmas\u0131na sebep olan hadise, Bayar'\u0131n 4 Aral\u0131k 1945 g\u00fcn\u00fc \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc taraf\u0131ndan \u00c7ankaya K\u00f6\u015fk\u00fc'ne yeme\u011fe davet edilmesi ve onunla ba\u015f ba\u015fa yedi\u011fi ak\u015fam yeme\u011fidir. Bu yemek daveti, yeni bir partinin kurulmas\u0131ndan ho\u015fnut olmayan CHP'lilerce ba\u015fka mecralara \u00e7ekilmi\u015fti. Bu \u00e7evreler "yeni parti bir muvazaa" partisidir \u015feklinde yaygara yapm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r.\u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc bu g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015fmeyle ilgili olarak Celal Bayar\u2019\u0131n kuracaklar\u0131 Demokrat Parti\u2019nin program\u0131n\u0131 nezaketen kendisine getirdi\u011fini ve kendisiyle partisi hakk\u0131nda g\u00f6r\u00fc\u015ft\u00fcklerini ve hi\u00e7bir zata bir parti te\u015fkil etmesi i\u00e7in teklif ve telkinde bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 s\u00f6yleyerek muvazaa iddialar\u0131n\u0131n do\u011fru olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 belirtmi\u015ftir.Muvazaa iddialar\u0131n\u0131n muhatab\u0131 olan Demokrat Parti\u2019nin Celal Bayar ve Adnan Menderes gibi kurucular\u0131 da 7 Ocak 1946 g\u00fcn\u00fc yapt\u0131klar\u0131 bas\u0131n toplant\u0131s\u0131nda \u201cMuvazaan\u0131n hafiflik oldu\u011fu ve ne bunu kabul edecek ne de bu teklifi ileri s\u00fcrecek kimseler olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve zaten \u00fclkenin de muvazaal\u0131 i\u015flere de tahamm\u00fcl\u00fc bulunmad\u0131\u011f\u0131\u201d a\u00e7\u0131klamas\u0131n\u0131 yaparak iddialar\u0131 kesinlikle reddetmi\u015flerdir.Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada Demokrat Parti\u2019nin kurulu\u015f s\u00fcrecinde siyasi \u00e7evreler ve bas\u0131nda tart\u0131\u015f\u0131lan \u201cmuvazaa iddialar\u0131\u201d ele al\u0131n\u0131p, verilmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lacakt\u0131r. a:6:{i:0;s:5:"Inonu";i:1;s:14:"National Chief";i:2;s:27:"Republican People\u2019s Party";i:3;s:16:"Democratic Party";i:4;s:9:"Collusion";i:5;s:5:"Claim";}; a:5:{i:0;s:19:"Milli \u015eef \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc";i:1;s:23:"Cumhuriyet Halk Partisi";i:2;s:14:"Demokrat Parti";i:3;s:7:"Muvazaa";i:4;s:6:"\u0130ddia";} Volume: 2, Issue: 1 63-76 ; 2717-6142 ; BELLEK Uluslararas\u0131 Tarih ve K\u00fclt\u00fcr Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 Dergisi AKANDERE, Osman"},{"id":"d0a63aed689605103819fd57d69c62b3936d96d15352548838808b350205cef0","content":"Some Challenges Faced During the National Independence War and the Determination of Turkish Grand Assembly to Overcome Them ; Mill\u00ee M\u00fccadele\u2019de Kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131lan Baz\u0131 Sorunlar ve T\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisinin Bunlar\u0131 \u00c7\u00f6zme Kararl\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131 The country had passed in a hard process when finally, the First Turkish Grand National Assembly opened on 23rd April 1920 since The Montrose Armistice was signed and the country was taken under the control of the occupation forces. At that time, the Assembly took over a vital duty. This duty was the execution of Turkish Independence War under the leadership of the Speaker of the Assembly, Mustafa Kemal Pasha. In such an environment with negative hopeless conditions in the country, the Assembly started to take the responsibility of the nation and saving the country from captivity. It was full of great challenges to manage such a hard process. Because in the period in question, there were very depressed and unfortunate developments. Developments such as the fall of Bursa, followed by the Circassian Ethem Rebellion and the relocation of the Assembly to Kayseri, which finally took place after the K\u00fctahya and Eski\u015fehir Wars, had caused psychologically sensitive traumas to the country. When Bursa fell, the insults of the Greeks caused great sorrow in the country. Even, a black cloth was laid on the speaking stand of the Assembly to show the mourning atmosphere. The Circassian Ethem Rebellion, which took place on the eve of the First In\u00f6n\u00fc War and left the Assembly between the twofires, was also an effective form of asymmetric exhaustion. Undoubtedly, the most fragile phase was the threat that even Ankara faced to the danger of falling after K\u00fctahya - Eski\u015fehir Wars. This situation caused a great bad mood and demotivation, uncertainty and uneasiness in the public. Managing all these events correctly and taking risks depending on location required serious skill. Even the slightest panic, impertinence and hesitant behavior that the Assembly would demonstrate could have immediately been reflected to the public. This would drag the ongoing struggle to a more critical phase and disrupt it. The Assembly successfully passed these exams. The Assembly acted very calm while managing these processes and caught up no concerns, apprehension and hesitation. They managed these processes with great courage, fortitude and enforcement. In this way, the War of Independence was successfully launched its target. This study is aimed to reveal the Assembly's determination and ability to solve problems in the face of these depressed and troubled events. ; Birinci T\u00fcrkiye B\u00fcy\u00fck Millet Meclisi, 23 Nisan 1920\u2019de a\u00e7\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda \u00fclke zor bir d\u00f6nemden ge\u00e7mekteydi. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc Mondros M\u00fctarekesi imzalanm\u0131\u015f ve \u00fclke, i\u015fgal kuvvetlerinin kontrol\u00fcne girmi\u015fti. Meclis, \u00e7ok b\u00fcy\u00fck bir g\u00f6rev \u00fcstlenmi\u015fti. Meclis Ba\u015fkan\u0131 Mustafa Kemal Pa\u015fa \u00f6nc\u00fcl\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde bu g\u00f6rev, y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclmekte olan \u0130stikl\u00e2l Sava\u015f\u0131\u2019n\u0131n sevk ve idare edilmesiydi. \u00dclkedeki t\u00fcm bu olumsuz \u015fartlar ve kasvetli ortamda Meclis, milletin sorumlulu\u011funu \u00fczerine al\u0131p onu esaretten kurtarmak i\u00e7in \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar ba\u015flatt\u0131. Bu s\u00fcrecin y\u00f6netilmesi, b\u00fcy\u00fck zorluklarla doluydu. \u00c7\u00fcnk\u00fc s\u00f6z konusu d\u00f6nemde \u00e7ok buhranl\u0131 ve talihsiz geli\u015fmeler ya\u015fanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Bursa\u2019n\u0131n d\u00fc\u015f\u00fc\u015f\u00fc, ard\u0131ndan \u00c7erkez Ethem \u0130syan\u0131 ve nihayet K\u00fctahya, Eski\u015fehir Sava\u015flar\u0131ndan sonra ya\u015fanan Meclisin Kayseri\u2019ye ta\u015f\u0131nmas\u0131 tart\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 gibi geli\u015fmeler; \u00fclkeye psikolojik a\u00e7\u0131dan \u00e7ok hassas travmalar ya\u015fatm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. Bursa d\u00fc\u015ft\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde, Yunanl\u0131lar\u0131n yapt\u0131klar\u0131 hakaretler, halkta b\u00fcy\u00fck bir \u00fcz\u00fcnt\u00fc meydana getirmi\u015fti. Hatta Meclis k\u00fcrs\u00fcs\u00fcne siyah bir \u00f6rt\u00fc serilmi\u015f ve matem tutulmu\u015ftu. Yine I. \u0130n\u00f6n\u00fc Sava\u015f\u0131 arifesinde \u00e7\u0131kan ve bu sava\u015fta, Meclisi iki ate\u015f aras\u0131nda b\u0131rakan \u00c7erkez Ethem \u0130syan\u0131 da etkili bir asimetrik y\u0131pratma bi\u00e7imi olmu\u015ftu. \u015e\u00fcphesiz en k\u0131r\u0131lgan safha; K\u00fctahya, Eski\u015fehir Sava\u015flar\u0131ndan sonra Ankara\u2019n\u0131n bile d\u00fc\u015fme tehlikesi alt\u0131na girmesiydi. Bu durum, halkta; b\u00fcy\u00fck bir moral-motivasyon bozuklu\u011fu, belirsizlik ve tedirginlik uyand\u0131rm\u0131\u015ft\u0131. T\u00fcm bu olaylar\u0131n do\u011fru y\u00f6netilmesi ve yerine g\u00f6re risk al\u0131nmas\u0131, ciddi bir maharet gerektirirdi. Meclisin g\u00f6sterece\u011fi en ufak bir panik, metanetsizlik ve m\u00fctereddit davran\u0131\u015f, an\u0131nda halka yans\u0131yabilirdi. Bu da y\u00fcr\u00fct\u00fclmekte olan m\u00fccadeleyi daha kritik bir evreye s\u00fcr\u00fckler ve onu sekteye u\u011fratabilirdi. Meclis, bu s\u0131navlar\u0131 ba\u015far\u0131yla ge\u00e7mi\u015ftir. Meclis, bu s\u00fcre\u00e7leri y\u00f6netirken \u00e7ok so\u011fukkanl\u0131 davranm\u0131\u015f; hi\u00e7bir vehme, vesveseye ve teredd\u00fcde kap\u0131lmam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu s\u00fcre\u00e7leri, b\u00fcy\u00fck bir cesaret, metanet ve suhuletle y\u00f6netmi\u015ftir. Bu sayede \u0130stikl\u00e2l Sava\u015f\u0131 ba\u015far\u0131l\u0131 bir \u015fekilde hedefe ula\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fma, Meclisin bu buhranl\u0131 ve s\u0131k\u0131nt\u0131l\u0131 olaylar kar\u015f\u0131s\u0131ndaki kararl\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 ve sorunlar\u0131 \u00e7\u00f6zme yetene\u011fini ortaya koymay\u0131 ama\u00e7lam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Assembly,occupation of Bursa; Meclis,Bursa\u2019n\u0131n \u0130\u015fgali Volume: 24, Issue: 2 569-588 ; 1304-4990 ; 2717-6568 ; Atat\u00fcrk \u00dcniversitesi Sosyal Bilimler Enstit\u00fcs\u00fc Dergisi TOSUN, Ulvi Ufuk"},{"id":"b21489d882c3e09e6b3c795ce19ca1c8ce0979bf5d27f092758c40596f5422eb","content":"The Practice of Collaborative Synergistic Leadership among Malaysian Primary School Science Head Department The practice of collaborative synergistic leadership among head of the primary school science department has used descriptive quantitative design. Synergistic collaborative work is one of the ways collaboration should be practiced in primary schools to enhance teachers' ability and effectiveness of teaching and learning thus helping to boost achievement in science education. The purpose of this descriptive study was to identify the level of leadership knowledge of the collaborative synergy of the science department and to identify the level of management skills possessed in the department management practice. A total of 45 head department from primary schools in Klang district, Malaysia were selected as respondents of this study for the purpose of sampling. The questionnaire used in this study was modified from Mohd Anuar (2007) and Zainorazlin (2001) and Syek (2007) to meet the objectives of the study. The Siegle Reliability Calculator was used to analyze the study data. The results of a pilot study in 25 primary schools showed that the level of collaborative synergy leadership knowledge and management skills in the Science Department were high, yielding a .83 Cronbach alpha. As a result of this pilot study, researchers have proposed several steps to improve and improve the instrumentation and methodology of collaborative synergy leadership research in schools. Leadership,Collaborative synergy,Head department,Primary school Volume: 17, Issue: 31-38 ; 2587-1730 ; The Eurasia Proceedings of Educational and Social Sciences ABD AZIZ, Eizuan Mueizany B\u0131n; AHMAD, Asmah Binti"},{"id":"6931675c5fb611e6e1dddf37ff3665a0ae807e56dea6010411fe70f280b440a0","content":"Skolledarskap i Sverige : en forsknings\u00f6versikt 2014\u20132018 The purpose of this research overview is to understand the main contemporary research objects that characterizes the research field of school leadership in Sweden. Published literature within the field between 2014 and 2018 together with a mapping of research interests from 99 university teachers in the state funded education programme for principals, form the understandings of the field. The results indicate that the field is constituted by the interests of foremost understanding governance, policy, inspection and school leaders work and pedagogical leadership. A need of systems thinking, investigations of skills and competences, and lack of critical research are examples that calls for new directions in future studies within the field. school leadership; Sweden; school leaders; principal; education; Pedagogy; Pedagogik  Norqvist, Lars; Poromaa Isling, P\u00e4r"},{"id":"203a61722f7836024b23771d03c18c900a6b274b74cc918719daf1c1202ef01f","content":"Impact on core values of family medicine from a 2-year Master's programme in Gezira, Sudan: observational study Background: Training of family physicians should include not only clinical and procedural skills, but also core values as comprehensive care, continuity of care, leadership and patient-centeredness. The Gezira Family Medicine Project (GFMP) is a 2 years Master\u2019s programme in family medicine in Sudan. We assessed the impact of GFMP on the candidates\u2019 adherence to some core values of family medicine. Methods: This is a prospective study with before-after design based on repeated surveys. We used Patient-Practitioner Orientation Scale (PPOS) to assess physicians\u2019 attitude towards patient-centeredness. Practice based data from individual patients\u2019 consultations and self-assessment methods were used to assess physicians\u2019 adherence to core values. Results: At the end of the programme the candidates (N = 110) were significantly more active in community health promotion (p < 0.001), more confident as a team leader (p = 0.008), and showed increased adherence to national guidelines for managing diabetes (p = 0.017) and hypertension (p = 0.003). The responding candidates had more knowledge about patients\u2019 medical history (p < 0.001), family history (p < 0.001) and family situation (p < 0.001). There were more planned follow up consultations (p < 0.001) and more referrals (p = 0.040). In contrast, results from PPOS showed slightly less orientation towards patient-centeredness (p = 0.007). Conclusions: The GFMP Master\u2019s programme induced a positive change in adherence to several core values of family medicine. The candidates became less patient-centered.  1471-2296 Mohamed, Khalid Gaffer; Hunsk\u00e5r, Steinar; Abdelrahman, Samira Hamid; Malik, Elfatih M."},{"id":"fd2757b58bbfe3041e60ccb6a9948d4c9836650d50e2f326e235ac56052d74da","content":"Actual clinical leadership: a shadowing study of charge nurses and doctors on-call in the emergency department Background: The provision of safe, high quality healthcare in the Emergency Department (ED) requires frontline healthcare personnel with sufficient competence in clinical leadership. However, healthcare education curriculum infrequently features learning about clinical leadership, and there is an absence of experienced doctors and nurses as role models in EDs for younger and less experienced doctors and nurses. The purpose of this study was to explore the activities performed by clinical leaders and to identify similarities and differences between the activities performed by charge nurses and those performed by doctors on-call in the Emergency Department after completion of a Clinical Leadership course. Methods: A qualitative exploratory design was chosen. Nine clinical leaders in the ED were shadowed. The data were analyzed using a thematic analysis. Results: The analysis revealed seven themes: receiving an overview of the team and patients and planning the shift; ensuring resources; monitoring and ensuring appropriate patient flow; monitoring and securing information flow; securing patient care and treatment; securing and assuring the quality of diagnosis and treatment of patient; and securing the prioritization of patients. The last two themes were exclusive to doctors on-call, while the theme \u201csecuring patient care and treatment\u201d was exclusive to charge nurses. Conclusions: Charge nurses and doctors on-call perform multitasking and complement each other as clinical leaders in the ED. The findings in this study provide new insights into how clinical leadership is performed by charge nurses and doctors on-call in the ED, but also the similarities and differences that exist in clinical leadership performance between the two professions. Clinical leadership is necessary to the provision of safe, high quality care and treatment for patients with acute health needs, as well as the coordination of healthcare services in the ED. More evaluation studies of this Clinical Leadership course would be valuable.  1757-7241 Huseb\u00f8, Sissel Iren Eikeland; Olsen, \u00d8ystein Evjen"},{"id":"89ad92e89bab3e9b43b86b66da74414b77eff87708c618b7461b373239974931","content":"US Politics on Delegitimation of Power in Palestine in 2014\u20142018 ; \u041f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0430 \u0421\u0428\u0410 \u043f\u043e \u0434\u0435\u043b\u0438\u0433\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043c\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u0432\u043b\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0432 \u041f\u0430\u043b\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0435 \u0432 2014\u20142018 \u0433\u0433. The article is devoted to the problem of Palestinian authority legitimacy. The author cites evidence of US policy negative impact, and in particular, statements by D. Trump on the Palestinian problem. Among the circumstances that can speed up the process of power deligitimation in Palestine the author singles out a number of factors related to the internal political situation in Palestinian establishment. The author comes to the conclusion that the US mediation in the region, starting from 2014, is rapidly turning into the position of the conflict party. The provocative statements of D. Trump pursue a goal of destabilization in Palestinian political system and implementation the \u201cSyrian scenario\u201d in strategic perspective. The power deligitimation in Palestine leads to the expansion of political support for the radical movement \u201cHamas\u201d among the Palestinian population. The situation is also complicated by the fact that the political elite of the Palestine Liberation Organization does not yet have a worthy successor for M. Abbas, who will be re-elected to the post of state head in 2019. In this situation the US takes an non-contractual position, nominating new \u201cpeaceful\u201d initiatives, which maximally satisfy only one side of the conflict, namely, the leadership of Israel. Currently, the new \u201cpeace initiative\u201d by D. Trump will bring nothing but another round of conflict escalation in the West Bank, as well as a new outbreak of violence in Jerusalem and Gaza Strip. Israel and the US are systematically ignoring the statements of M. Abbas, placing the head of Palestine in the position of an extremely weak leader, unable to defend the interests of Palestinians in peace talks. At the same time, the Palestinian side in 2017-2018 resolutely refused any negotiations with the US on the conflict settlement, having apphed for diplomatic support by Russian Federation. ;
